Mod, Or and Everything

Rocket land

Puzzle loop

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Tue Jul 20 17:38:11 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
constexpr int N(17 * 16 * 2 + 5);
using BTS = std::bitset<N>;
BTS p[N], tmp;
bool ins(BTS &x) {
  for (int i = N - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (!x[i]) continue;
    if (!p[i][i]) {
      p[i] = x;
      return true;
    }
    x ^= p[i];
  }
  return false;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, m;
    for (auto &v : p) v.reset();
    std::cin >> n >> m;
    n--, m--;
    int t = (n + 1) * m, ans = t + n * (m + 1);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      std::string s;
      std::cin >> s;
      for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
        if (s[j] == '.') continue;
        tmp.reset();
        tmp[i * m + j] = 1;
        tmp[(i + 1) * m + j] = 1;
        tmp[t + i * (m + 1) + j] = 1;
        tmp[t + i * (m + 1) + j + 1] = 1;
        tmp[N - 1] = s[j] - '0';
        if (ins(tmp)) ans--;
      }
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < n + 1; i++) {
      for (int j = 0; j < m + 1; j++) {
        tmp.reset();
        if (j < m) tmp[i * m + j] = 1;
        if (j) tmp[i * m + j - 1] = 1;
        if (i < n) tmp[t + i * (m + 1) + j] = 1;
        if (i) tmp[t + (i - 1) * (m + 1) + j] = 1;
        if (ins(tmp)) ans--;
      }
    }
    ans = fpow(2, ans);
    if (p[N - 1][N - 1]) {
      p[N - 1][N - 1] = 0;
      for (int i = N - 2; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (p[N - 1][i]) p[N - 1] ^= p[i];
      }
      if (p[N - 1].none()) ans = 0;
    }
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

Another thief in a Shop

Xor sum

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Tue Jul 20 12:34:29 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(1e5 + 5);

int ch[N * 30][2], max[N * 30], cnt;
void ins(int x, int id) {
  int o = 0;
  for (int i = 29; i >= 0; i--) {
    int u = x >> i & 1;
    if (!ch[o][u]) {
      ch[o][u] = ++cnt;
      ch[cnt][0] = ch[cnt][1] = 0;
      max[cnt] = 0;
    }
    o = ch[o][u];
    smax(max[o], id);
  }
  
}
PII ask(int x, int o = 0, int d = 29) {
  int ans = 0;
  for (int i = d; i >= 0; i--) {
    int u = x >> i & 1;
    if (ch[o][u ^ 1]) {
      ans |= 1 << i;
      o = ch[o][u ^ 1];
    } else {
      o = ch[o][u];
    }
  }
  return {ans, max[o]};
}
int getMax(int x, int k) {
  int ans = 0, o = 0, now = 0;
  for (int i = 29; i >= 0; i--) {
    auto v = ask(x, o, i);
    if (now + v.first >= k) {
      smax(ans, v.second);
    }
    int u = (x ^ k) >> i & 1;
    if (!ch[o][u]) {
      return ans;
      // u ^= 1;
    }
    if (k >> i & 1) now |= 1 << i;
    o = ch[o][u];
  }
  if (now >= k) smax(ans, max[o]);
  return ans;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, k;
    cnt = 0;
    ch[0][0] = ch[0][1] = 0;
    max[0] = 0;
    std::cin >> n >> k;
    ins(0, 0);
    int ans = 1e9, l = 0, r = 0;
    for (int i = 1, w = 0, x; i <= n; i++) {
      std::cin >> x;
      w ^= x;
      if (ask(w).first >= k) {
        x = getMax(w, k);
        if (smin(ans, i - x)) {
          l = x + 1;
          r = i;
        }
      }
      ins(w, i);
    }
    if (l) {
      std::cout << l << " " << r << "\n";
    } else {
      std::cout << "-1\n";
    }
    
  };
  return 0;
}

Pass!

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Tue Jul 20 14:07:53 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <ext/pb_ds/assoc_container.hpp>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int P(998244353);
inline void inc(int &x, int y) {
  x += y;
  if (x >= P) x -= P;
}
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
int cal(int n, int t) {
  int ans = fpow(n - 1, t);
  if (t & 1) inc(ans, P - n + 1);
  else inc(ans, n - 1);
  return 1LL * ans * fpow(n) % P;
}

int bsgs(int a, int b) {
  b %= P;
  std::vector<PII> v;
  const int t = (int)sqrt(P) + 1;
  for (int j = 0, pw = 1; j < t; j++, pw = 1LL * pw * a % P) {
    int val = 1LL * b * pw % P;
    v.push_back({val, j});
  }
  std::sort(v.begin(), v.end());
  a = fpow(a, t);
  if (!a) return b == 0 ? 1 : -1;
  for (int i = 0, j, pw = 1; i <= t; i++, pw = 1LL * pw * a % P) {
    auto it = std::lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), PII(pw, 0));
    if (it == v.end() || it->first != pw) {
      j = -1;
    } else {
      j = it->second;
    }
    if (j >= 0 && i * t - j >= 0) return i * t - j;
  }
  return -1;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  // std::cout << cal(11, 2);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, x, y;
    std::cin >> n >> x;
    y = x = 1LL * n * x % P;
    inc(x, n - 1);
    inc(y, P - n + 1);
    int t1 = bsgs(n - 1, x);
    int t2 = bsgs(n - 1, y);
    int ans = P;
    if (~t1 && (t1 & 1)) smin(ans, t1);
    if (~t2 && (~t2 & 1)) smin(ans, t2);
    if (ans == P) ans = -1;
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Tue Jul 20 13:19:19 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
inline char gc() {
  static constexpr int BufferSize = 1 << 22 | 5;
  static char buf[BufferSize], *p, *q;
  static std::streambuf *i = std::cin.rdbuf();
  return p == q ? p = buf, q = p + i->sgetn(p, BufferSize), p == q ? EOF : *p++ : *p++;
}
struct Reader {
  template <class T>
  Reader &operator>>(T &w) {
    char c, p = 0;
    for (; !std::isdigit(c = gc());) if (c == '-') p = 1;
    for (w = c & 15; std::isdigit(c = gc()); w = w * 10 + (c & 15)) ;
    if (p) w = -w;
    return *this;
  }
} cin;

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
constexpr int N(1e5 + 5), M(5e5 + 5);
struct Edge {
  int v, w, next;
} e[M << 1];
int head[N], tot;
void add(int x, int y, int z) {
  e[++tot] = {y, z, head[x]}, head[x] = tot;
  e[++tot] = {x, z, head[y]}, head[y] = tot;
}
int vis[N], cnt;
void dfs(int x, int d) {
  vis[x] = cnt;
  for (int i = head[x]; i; i = e[i].next) {
    int y = e[i].v;
    if (e[i].w > d || vis[y] == cnt) continue;
    dfs(y, d);
  }
}
std::array<int, 3> ee[M];
struct Dsu {
  std::vector<int> f;
  Dsu(int n) : f(n) {
    std::iota(f.begin(), f.end(), 0);
  }
  int find(int x) {
    while (x != f[x]) {
      x = f[x] = f[f[x]];
    }
    return x;
  }
  bool same(int x, int y) {
    return find(x) == find(y);
  }
  bool merge(int x, int y) {
    return same(x, y) ? false : f[find(x)] = find(y), true;
  }
};
int main() {
  // freopen("1.in", "r", stdin);
  // freopen("t.out", "w", stdout);
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, m, k;
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    int r = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) head[i] = 0;
    tot = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      int x, y, z;
      cin >> x >> y >> z;
      ee[i] = {z, x, y};
      smax(r, z);
    }
    std::sort(ee + 1, ee + 1 + m);
    Dsu d(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      int x = ee[i][1], y = ee[i][2], z = ee[i][0];
      if (!d.same(x, y)) d.merge(x, y), add(x, y, z);
    }
    int l = 0;
    auto cal = [&](int d) {
      cnt++;
      int res = 0;
      for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (vis[i] != cnt) dfs(i, d), res++;
      }
      return res;
    };
    while (l < r) {
      int m = l + r >> 1;
      if (cal(m) > k) {
        l = m + 1;
      } else {
        r = m;
      }
    }
    if (cal(l) == k) {
      std::cout << l << "\n";
    } else {
      std::cout << "-1\n";
    }
  }
  return 0;
}

zoto

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Tue Jul 20 12:11:35 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(1e5 + 5), T(512);
int n, m, a[N];
struct Qry {
  int l, r, x, y, id;
  bool operator<(const Qry &rhs) const {
    return l / T == rhs.l / T ? r < rhs.r : l < rhs.l;
  }
} q[N];
int sum[N], b[N];
void add(int p, int x) {
  b[p] += x;
  sum[p / T] += x;
}
int ask(int l, int r) {
  int bl = l / T, br = r / T, ans = 0;
  if (bl == br) {
    for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) ans += b[i];
    return ans;
  }
  int y = bl * T + T, x = br * T;
  for (int i = l; i < y; i++) ans += b[i];
  for (int i = x; i <= r; i++) ans += b[i];
  for (int i = bl + 1; i < br; i++) ans += sum[i];
  return ans;
}
int cnt[N], ans[N];
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    std::cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) std::cin >> a[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      int a, b, c, d;
      std::cin >> a >> b >> c >> d;
      q[i] = {a, c, b, d, i};
    }
    std::sort(q + 1, q + 1 + m);
    int x = 1, y = 0;
    memset(cnt, 0, sizeof cnt);
    memset(sum, 0, sizeof sum);
    memset(b, 0, sizeof b);
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      int l, r, qx, qy, id;
      l = q[i].l;
      r = q[i].r;
      qx = q[i].x;
      qy = q[i].y;
      id = q[i].id;
      while (x > l) {
        if (++cnt[a[--x]] == 1) {
          add(a[x], 1);
        }
      }
      while (y < r) {
        if (++cnt[a[++y]] == 1) {
          add(a[y], 1);
        }
      }
      while (x < l) {
        if (--cnt[a[x]] == 0) {
          add(a[x], -1);
        }
        x++;
      }
      while (y > r) {
        if (--cnt[a[y]] == 0) {
          add(a[y], -1);
        }
        y--;
      }
      ans[id] = ask(qx, qy);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
      std::cout << ans[i] << "\n";
    }
  }
  return 0;
}

char s[N], *now = s;
std::array<int, 26> ch[N];
int fa[N], len[N], cnt, dep[N];
int jmp(int x) {
  for (; now[~len[x]] != *now; x = fa[x]) ;
  return x; 
}
int ins(int x) {
  static int p, q;
  now++;
  if (!ch[p = jmp(p)][x]) {
    len[q = ++cnt] = len[p] + 2;
    fa[q] = ch[jmp(fa[p])][x];
    ch[p][x] = q;
    dep[q] = dep[fa[q]] + 1;
  }
  return p = ch[p][x];
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  std::cin >> s + 1;

  fa[0] = 1;
  len[1] = -1;
  cnt = 1;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    s[i] = (s[i] - 'a' + k) % 26 + 'a';
    k = dep[ins(s[i] - 'a')];
    std::cout << k << " ";
  }
  return 0;
}

using BS = std::bitset<2000>;
using PBI = std::pair<BS, int>;
PBI base[2000];
void ins(PBI x) {
  for (int i = 1999; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (!x.first[i]) continue;
    if (x.second > base[i].second) {
      std::swap(x, base[i]);
      if (!x.second) break;
    }
    x.first ^= base[i].first;
  }
}

\[ \det(P)\neq 0, V = \begin{pmatrix} v_1\\ v_2\\ \vdots\\ v_n \end{pmatrix}, B= \begin{pmatrix} base_1\\ \vdots\\ 0\\ \vdots\\ base_m\\ \vdots\\ 0\\ \vdots \end{pmatrix} \]

Code

ç¦»çº¿

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Mon Jul  5 14:24:21 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;
using BS = std::bitset<2000>;
using PBI = std::pair<BS, int>;
int n, m, q;
PBI base[2000];
void ins(PBI x) {
  for (int i = m - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (!x.first[i]) continue;
    if (x.second > base[i].second) {
      std::swap(x, base[i]);
      if (!x.second) break;
    }
    x.first ^= base[i].first;
  }

}
BS a[2005];
std::vector<PBI> g[2005];
int t[2005];
bool ask[2005];
char tmp[2005];
int main() {
  scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &q);
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    scanf("%s", tmp);
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) a[i][j] = tmp[m - 1- j] ^ '0';
  }
  for (int i = 1; i <= q; i++) {
    int opt;
    scanf("%d", &opt);
    if (opt == 3) {
      ask[i] = true;
    } else {
      int x, y;
      BS z;
      scanf("%d%d", &x, &y);
      scanf("%s", tmp);
      for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) z[j] = tmp[m - 1- j] ^ '0';
      y++;
      if (opt == 1) {
    if (t[x] != -1) g[t[x]].emplace_back(a[x] ^ a[x - 1], i - 1);
    if (t[y] != -1) g[t[y]].emplace_back(a[y] ^ a[y - 1], i - 1);
    for (int j = x; j < y; j++) a[j] ^= z;
    t[x] = t[y] = i;
      } else {
    for (int j = x; j <= y && j <= n; j++) {
      if (t[j] != -1) g[t[j]].emplace_back(a[j] ^ a[j - 1], i - 1);
      t[j] = -1;
    }
    for (int j = x; j < y; j++) a[j] = z;
    t[x] = t[y] = i;
      }
    }
  }
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) if (t[i] != -1) g[t[i]].emplace_back(a[i] ^ a[i - 1], q);
  for (int i = 0; i <= q; i++) {
    for (auto &v : g[i]) ins(v);
    if (!ask[i]) continue;
    BS ans;
    for (int j = m - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
      if (base[j].second >= i && !ans[j]) ans ^= base[j].first;
    }
    for (int j = m - 1; j >= 0; j--) putchar("01"[ans[j]]);
    puts("");
  }
  return 0;
}

åœ¨çº¿

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Mon Jul  5 15:29:33 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(2005);
using BS = std::bitset<N>;
int n, m, q;
int base[N];
BS a[N], v[N], p[N];
void ins(int id) {
  for (int i = m - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (!v[id][i]) continue;
    if (!base[i]) {
      base[i] = id;
      return;
    }
    v[id] ^= v[base[i]];
    p[id] ^= p[base[i]];
  }
}
void update(int id, const BS &z) {
  if (z.none()) return;
  int j = 0;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    if (v[i].any() || !p[i][id]) continue;
    j = i;
    break;
  }
  if (!j) {
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
      if (!base[i] || !p[base[i]][id]) continue;
      j = base[i];
      base[i] = 0;
      break;
    }
  }
  assert(j);
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    if (i == j || !p[i][id]) continue;
    v[i] ^= v[j];
    p[i] ^= p[j];
  }
  v[j] ^= z;
  ins(j);
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  std::cin >> n >> m >> q;
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    std::cin >> a[i];
    v[i] = a[i] ^ a[i - 1];
    p[i].set(i);
    ins(i);
  }
  while (q--) {
    int opt, x, y;
    BS z;
    std::cin >> opt;
    if (opt == 1) {
      std::cin >> x >> y >> z;
      update(x, z);
      if (y < n) update(y + 1, z);
      for (int i = x; i <= y; i++) a[i] ^= z;
    } else if (opt == 2) {
      std::cin >> x >> y >> z;
      update(x, a[x] ^ z);
      if (y < n) update(y + 1, a[y] ^ z);
      for (int i = x; i < y; i++) update(i + 1, a[i] ^ a[i + 1]);
      for (int i = x; i <= y; i++) a[i] = z;
    } else {
      z.reset();
      for (int i = m - 1; i >= 0; std::cout << z[i--]) {
    if (base[i] && !z[i]) z ^= v[base[i]];
      }
      std::cout << "\n";
    }
  }
  return 0;
}

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª \(hÃ—w\) çš„æ–¹æ ¼è¡¨ï¼Œæœ‰äº›æ ¼å­æ˜¯å¢™ï¼Œæœ‰äº›æ ¼å­æ˜¯ç»ˆç‚¹ï¼Œå‰©ä¸‹çš„æ ¼å­æ˜¯ç©ºåœ°ã€‚

ä½ ç°åœ¨è¦åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè¿›è¡Œéšæœºæ¸¸èµ°ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€è½®å‘ä¸Šã€ä¸‹ã€å·¦ã€å³çš„æ¦‚ç‡åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º \(u\%,d\%,l\%,r\%\)ï¼Œå¦‚æœç§»åŠ¨åè¶…è¿‡æ–¹æ ¼è¡¨æˆ–åˆ°è¾¾å¢™ï¼Œåˆ™è¿™æ¬¡ç§»åŠ¨å¤±æ•ˆï¼Œä¿æŒåŸåœ°ä¸åŠ¨ã€‚

å½“ä½ åˆ°è¾¾ç»ˆç‚¹æ—¶ï¼Œæ¸¸æˆå°±ç»“æŸäº†ã€‚ç°åœ¨ï¼Œåœ¨æ–¹æ ¼è¡¨ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œçš„æ‰€æœ‰ç©ºåœ°ä¸­å‡åŒ€éšæœºä¸€ä¸ªä½œä¸ºèµ·ç‚¹ï¼Œæ±‚ä½ å°±è¿›å…¥æ¯ä¸ªç»ˆç‚¹çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚

\(1â‰¤wâ‰¤20, 2â‰¤hâ‰¤10000\)ã€‚

è®¾å…¶ä¸­ä¸€ä¸ªç»ˆç‚¹ä¸º \(t\)ï¼Œ\(f_{i, j}\) è¡¨ç¤º \((i, j)\) èµ°åˆ° \(t\) çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚ \[ f_{i, j} = uf_{i-1, j}+df_{i+1, j}+lf_{i, j-1}+rf_{i, j+1} \]

\[ f_{i, j} - uf_{i-1, j} - df_{i+1, j} - lf_{i, j-1} - rf_{i, j+1}=0 \]

\[ f_t=1 \]

\[ P\cdot\mathbf{f}=\mathbf{e} \]

\(P\) æ˜¯ \(wh \times wh\) çš„æ–¹é˜µï¼Œ\(\mathbf{f},\mathbf{e}\) æ˜¯åˆ—å‘é‡ã€‚å…¶ä¸­ \(e_i=[i=t]\)ã€‚ \[ \mathbf{f}=P^{-1}\mathbf{f} \] è®¾ \(1\dots s\) ä¸ºèµ·ç‚¹ ï¼Œç­”æ¡ˆä¸º \[ ans = \frac1s \sum_{i=1}^sf_i \] å†™æˆçŸ©é˜µçš„å½¢å¼ï¼Œè®¾è¡Œå‘é‡ \(\mathbf{v}^T=\begin{pmatrix} 1 & 1 & 1 & \cdots & 0 & 0 & \cdots \end{pmatrix}\)ï¼Œå‰é¢æœ‰ \(s\) ä¸ª1ï¼Œå…¶ä»–éƒ½æ˜¯0ã€‚ \[ \begin{aligned} ans &= \frac1s \mathbf{v}^T\mathbf{f}\\ &= \frac1s\mathbf{v}^TP^{-1}\mathbf{e}\\ \end{aligned} \] ç›¸å½“äºæ±‚è¡Œå‘é‡ \(\alpha^T = \dfrac1s\mathbf{v}^TP^{-1}\) ç¬¬ \(t\) ç»´çš„å€¼ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥åªè¦æ±‚å‡ºè¿™ä¸ªè¡Œå‘é‡å³å¯ã€‚ \[ \alpha^T P = \frac1s\mathbf{v} \]

\[ P^T\alpha=\frac1s\mathbf{v}^T \]

è§£è¿™ä¸ªçº¿æ€§æ–¹ç¨‹ç»„ï¼Œç›´æ¥é«˜æ–¯æ¶ˆå…ƒæ˜¾ç„¶ä¸è¡Œã€‚

å¦‚æœæŒ‰ç…§ä»ä¸Šåˆ°ä¸‹ä»å·¦åˆ°å³çš„é¡ºåºæ ‡å·ï¼Œ\(P^T\) æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦çŠ¶çŸ©é˜µï¼Œæ¯è¡Œåªéœ€å­˜å‚¨ \(2w+1\) ä¸ªå…ƒç´ ã€‚

ç„¶åæ¶ˆå…ƒå³å¯ã€‚

// Author:  HolyK
// Created: Mon Jul  5 11:36:58 2021
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int dx[] = {-1, 1, 0, 0}, dy[] = {0, 0, -1, 1};
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, m, tot;
  double p[4];
  std::cin >> m >> n;
  tot = n * m;
  for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) std::cin >> p[i], p[i] /= 100;
  std::vector<std::string> s(n);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) std::cin >> s[i];
  
  std::vector<std::vector<double>> a(tot, std::vector<double>(m * 2 + 1));
  for (int i = 0, o = 0; i < n; i++) {
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++, o++) {
      a[o][m] = 1;
      if (s[i][j] != '.') continue;
      for (int d = 0; d < 4; d++) {
    int x = i + dx[d], y = j + dy[d];
    if (x < 0 || y < 0 || x >= n || y >= m || s[x][y] == 'X') {
      a[o][m] -= p[d];
    } else {
      // a[o][m + dx[d] * m + dy[d]] -= p[d ^ 1];
      a[x * m + y][m + o - (x * m + y)] -= p[d];
    }
      }
    }
  }
  // for (int i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
  //   for (int j = 0; j < m * 2 + 1; j++) std::cout << a[i][j] << " \n"[j == 2 * m];
  // }
  int cnt = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) cnt += s[0][i] == '.';
  std::vector<double> b(tot);
  for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) b[i] = 1.0 / cnt;
  for (int i = 0; i < tot; i++) {
    if (fabs(a[i][m]) < 1e-12) {
      b[i] = 0;
      continue;
    }
    for (int j = i + 1; j < tot && j <= i + m; j++) {
      double c = a[j][m + i - j] / a[i][m];
      for (int k = 0; k <= m; k++) a[j][m + k + i - j] -= a[i][m + k] * c;
      b[j] -= b[i] * c;
    }
  }
  for (int i = tot - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (fabs(a[i][m]) < 1e-12) continue;
    for (int j = i + 1; j < tot && j <= i + m; j++) {
      b[i] -= b[j] * a[i][m + j - i];
    }
    b[i] /= a[i][m];
  }
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
      if (s[i][j] == 'T')
    printf("%.9f\n", b[i * m + j]);
  return 0;
}

0x01.FWT æ¦‚è®º

    ç±»ä¼¼åœ°å®šä¹‰ä½è¿ç®—å·ç§¯ : \({}\) ç¬¬ \({i}\) é¡¹å’Œç¬¬ \({j}\) é¡¹çš„ä¹˜ç§¯è´¡çŒ®åˆ°ç¬¬ \({i \oplus j}\) é¡¹ã€‚å…¶ä¸­ \({\oplus}\) æ˜¯æŸç§ä½è¿ç®—ã€‚

    å³ \({S[k]=\sum_{i \oplus j=k} A[i] B[j]}\), è®°ä½œå·ç§¯å¼ \({A * B=S}\) ã€‚

  • æ„é€ çš„å°è¯• ä¼—æ‰€å‘¨çŸ¥, \({\mathrm{FFT}}\) æŠŠå¤šé¡¹å¼è½¬æ¢æˆç‚¹å€¼ä¹‹å, ä»å·ç§¯å˜ä¸ºäº†ç›´æ¥ç‚¹ç§¯ã€‚

    æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªç„¶ä¹ŸæœŸæœ›æŠŠä½è¿ç®—å·ç§¯è½¬åŒ–æˆç‚¹ç§¯ã€‚

    è®¾ \({F W T(A)}\) æ˜¯å¹•çº§æ•° \({A}\) ç»è¿‡ \({\mathrm{FWT}}\) å˜æ¢ä¹‹åå¾—åˆ°çš„å¹•çº§æ•°ã€‚

    æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä»¤å…¶æ»¡è¶³ : \({ A * B=C \Longleftrightarrow F W T(A) \cdot F W T(B)=F W T(C)}\) (ç‚¹ç§¯)ã€‚

    \({\mathrm{FFT}}\) æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¿æ€§å˜æ¢ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¹Ÿå¸Œæœ› \({\mathrm{FWT}}\) å˜æ¢æ˜¯çº¿æ€§çš„ã€‚ æˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜ä¸çŸ¥é“æ€ä¹ˆå˜æ¢ï¼Œäºæ˜¯è®¾ \({c(i, j)}\) ä¸ºå˜æ¢ç³»æ•°, å³ \({A[j]}\) å¯¹ \({F W T(A)[i]}\) çš„è´¡çŒ®ç³»æ•°ã€‚

    åˆ™ \({F W T(A)[i]=\sum_{j=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) A_{j}}\)

    æ ¹æ® \({F W T(A) \cdot F W T(B)=F W T(C)}\), å¾—åˆ°ï¼š \[ { \begin{array}{l} F W T(A)[i] F W T(B)[i]=F W T(C)[i] \\ \sum_{j=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) A[j] \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} c(i, k) B[k]=\sum_{p=0}^{n-1} c(i, p) C[p] \\ \sum_{j=0}^{n-1} \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) c(i, k) A[j] B[k]=\sum_{p=0}^{n-1} c(i, p) C[p] \end{array} } \]

    æ ¹æ® \({A * B=C}\), åˆèƒ½å¾—åˆ° : \[ { C[p]=\sum_{t_{1} \oplus t_{2}=p} A\left[t_{1}\right] B\left[t_{2}\right] } \] \[ \begin{array}{c} \sum_{p=0}^{n-1} c(i, p) C[p]=\sum_{p=0}^{n-1} c(i, p) \sum_{t_{\oplus} \oplus 2=p} A\left[t_{1}\right] B\left[t_{2}\right] \\ \sum_{j=0}^{n-1} \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) c(i, k) A[j] B[k]=\sum_{p=0}^{n-1} c(i, p) \sum_{t_{1} \oplus t_{2}=p} A\left[t_{1}\right] B\left[t_{2}\right] \\ \sum_{j=0}^{n-1} \sum_{k=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) c(i, k) A[j] B[k]=\sum_{p=0}^{n-1} \sum_{t_{1} \oplus t_{2}=p} A\left[t_{1}\right] B\left[t_{2}\right] c\left(i, t_{1} \oplus t_{2}\right)=\sum_{t_{1}=0}^{n-1} \sum_{t_{2}=0}^{n-1} A\left[t_{1}\right] B\left[t_{2}\right] c\left(i, t_{1} \oplus t_{2}\right) \end{array} \] åˆ°å·¦å³ä¸¤è¾¹, å¾—åˆ° \({c(i, j) c(i, k)=c(i, j \oplus k)}\), åªéœ€è¦æ»¡è¶³è¿™ä¸ªå°±å¥½äº†ã€‚

    å¦å¤–,ç”±äºä½äºæ¯ä¸€ä½çš„ç‹¬ç«‹æ€§, \({c(i, j)}\) ä¹Ÿæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªé‡è¦æ€§è´¨: å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä½è€ƒè™‘ã€‚

    å‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»(æ ¹æ®çœŸå€¼è¡¨)æ±‚å‡ºæ»¡è¶³è¦æ±‚çš„ \({c([0,1],[0,1])}\) ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬èƒ½è¿™æ ·æ„é€ å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰çš„ \({c}\) :

    è®¾äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•° \({a}\) çš„æ¯ä¸€ä½åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º : \({a_{0}, a_{1}, a_{2} \ldots}\)

    åˆ™æœ‰ \({c(i, j)=c\left(i_{0}, j_{0}\right) c\left(i_{1}, j_{1}\right) c\left(i_{2}, j_{2}\right) \ldots}\), å°±æ˜¯æŠŠæ¯ä¸€ä½çš„å˜æ¢ç³»æ•°ä¹˜èµ·æ¥ã€‚

    é‚£ä¹ˆ: å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ª \({t}\), éƒ¨ \({c\left(i_{t}, j_{t}\right) c\left(i_{t}, k_{t}\right)=c\left(i_{t}, j_{t} \oplus k_{t}\right) \Longleftrightarrow c(i, j) c(i, k)=c(i, j \oplus k)}\)

    è¿™å°±ç¬¦åˆæˆ‘ä»¬çš„æ¡ä»¶ã€‚

    å¥½äº†,ç°åœ¨å‡è®¾æˆ‘ä»¬å·²ç»æœ‰äº†ç¬¦åˆè¦æ±‚çš„ \({c}\),å¦‚ä½•å¿«é€Ÿæ±‚è§£ \({\mathrm{FWT}}\) å˜æ¢å‘¢?

    \({F W T(A)[i]=\sum_{j=0}^{n-1} c(i, j) A[j]}\)

    æ ¹æ®è¿™ä¸ªå¼å­ç›´æ¥æ±‚å’Œ,å¤æ‚åº¦è‡³å°‘æ˜¯ \({O\left(n^{2}\right)}\) çš„,å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰èµ·åˆ°ä¼˜åŒ–ä½œç”¨ã€‚

    æˆ‘ä»¬è€ƒè™‘æŒ‰ä½æ‹†åŠï¼š

    \({=\sum_{j=0}^{(n / 2)-1} c(i, j) A[j]+\sum_{j=(n / 2)}^{n-1} c(i, j) A[j]}\)

    è®¾ \({i{\prime}}\) ä¸º \({i}\) å»æ‰äºŒè¿›åˆ¶é¦–ä½å‰©ä¸‹çš„æ•°ã€‚

    åœ¨é¦–ä½åˆ†å¼€è€ƒè™‘ :

    \({=\sum_{j=0}^{(n / 2)-1} c\left(i_{0}, j_{0}\right) c\left(i{\prime}, j{\prime}\right) A[j]+\sum_{j=(n / 2)}^{n-1} c\left(i_{0}, j_{0}\right) c\left(i{\prime}, j{\prime}\right) A[j]}\) \({=c\left(i_{0}, 0\right) \sum_{j=0}^{(n / 2)-1} c\left(i{\prime}, j{\prime}\right) A[j]+c\left(i_{0}, 1\right) \sum_{j=(n / 2)}^{n-1} c\left(i{\prime}, j{\prime}\right) A[j]}\)

    è€ƒè™‘åˆ° \({c\left(i{\prime}, j{\prime}\right)}\) å°±æ˜¯å»æ‰æœ€é«˜ä½çš„å­å˜æ¢è¿™é‡Œè§„æ¨¡å‡åŠäº†ã€‚

    è®¾ \({A_{0}}\) ä¸ºå¹•çº§æ•°ä¸‹æ ‡é¦–ä½ä¸º 0 çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ç±»ä¼¼åœ°æœ‰ \({A_{1}}\) ã€‚

    è‹¥ \({i_{0}=0}\), åˆ™æœ‰ï¼š

    \({F W T(A)[i]=c(0,0) F W T\left(A_{0}\right)[i]+c(0,1) F W T\left(A_{1}\right)[i] (i \in[0, n / 2))}\)

    è‹¥ \({i_{0}=1}\), åˆ™æœ‰ï¼š

    \({F W T(A)[i+(n / 2)]=c(1,0) F W T\left(A_{0}\right)[i]+c(1,1) F W T\left(A_{1}\right)[i] (i \in[0, n / 2))}\)

    æˆ‘ä»¬å°±èƒ½ä»¥ \({O(n)}\) çš„ä»£ä»·,æ ¹æ®ä¸Šåˆ—å¼å­åˆå¹¶ä¸¤ä¸ªè§„æ¨¡ä¸º \({n / 2}\) çš„å­å˜æ¢ã€‚

    æ‰€ä»¥,è‹¥ \({n=2^{m}}\),éœ€è¦åˆå¹¶ \({m}\) æ¬¡,å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \({O\left(m 2^{m}\right)}\) ã€‚

    (å¯èƒ½æœ‰ç‚¹æŠ½è±¡,ä½†æ˜¯æ‚¨å¦‚æœå†™è¿‡FFT,çœ‹åˆ°ä»£ç å°±ä¼šå€¼äº†)

    æ­¤å¤–,é€†å˜æ¢ IFWT å°±æ˜¯å¯¹ \({c}\) çŸ©é˜µæ±‚ä¸ªé€†,å…·ä½“è§ä¸‹æ–‡ã€‚

    ( ä¸€ä¸ªé‡è¦çš„åœ°æ–¹æ˜¯,è¿™ä¸ªæ„é€ å‡ºæ¥çš„ c çŸ©é˜µä¸€å®šè¦æœ‰é€†,å¦åˆ™å°±å˜æ¢ä¸å›å»TAT )

0x02.åŸºç¡€ä½è¿ç®—å·ç§¯

é’ˆå¯¹ä¸åŒçš„ä½è¿ç®—,æ ¹æ® \({c(i, j) c(i, k)=c(i, j \oplus k)}\) æ„é€ å‡º \({c([0,1],[0,1])}\) å³å¯ã€‚

æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠè¿™ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µç§°ä¸ºä½çŸ©é˜µã€‚

æ„é€ çš„è¿‡ç¨‹å¯èƒ½æœ‰äº›ç¹æ‚, å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥è®°ç»“è®º, æˆ–è€…å»åé¢çœ‹æ‰©å±•ç‰ˆçš„ã€‚

1.1 Or å·ç§¯

è®¾ä½çŸ©é˜µä¸º \(c=\begin{bmatrix}c(0,0)&c(0,1)\\c(1,0)&c(1,1)\end{bmatrix}\)

èµ·ç‚¹ : \({c(i, j) c(i, k)=c(i, j | k)}\)

\({\Rightarrow c(0,1)=0}\) æˆ– \({c(0,0)=c(0,1)=1}\) - \({c(1,1) c(1,0)=c(1,1 | 0)}\)

\({\Rightarrow c(1,1)=0}\) æˆ– \({c(1,0)=c(1,1)=1}\)

é¦–å…ˆ,å¦‚æœæœ‰ä¸€æ’0å°±ä¸€åˆ—0é‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µå°±æ²¡æœ‰é€†,é‚£ä¹ˆå¯ä»¥æ„é€ å‡º: ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µ\(\begin{bmatrix}1&1\\1&0\end{bmatrix}\) æˆ– \(\begin{bmatrix}1&0\\1&1\end{bmatrix}\)ã€‚

Tips : \(Or\) å·ç§¯çš„ä¸Šé¢ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªçŸ©é˜µ \(FWT\) ç›¸å½“äºå­é›†æ±‚å’Œã€‚

(ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨é«˜ç»´å‰ç¼€å’Œæ¥æ¨å¯¼)

(ä¸‹é¢é‡‡ç”¨ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªçŸ©é˜µ)

\(FWT(A)[i]=FWT(A_0)[i]\)

1.2 And å·ç§¯

èµ·ç‚¹ : \(c(i,j)c(i,k)=c(i,j\&k)\)ã€‚

åŒä¸Š,å®¹æ˜“å¾—åˆ° \(c(\_,\_)âˆˆ\{0,1\}\)ã€‚ - \(c(0,1)c(0,0)=c(0,1\&0)\) \(\Rightarrow c(0,0)=0\) æˆ– \(c(0,0)=c(0,1)=1\) - \(c(1,1)c(1,0)=c(1,1\&0)\) \(\Rightarrow c(1,0)=0\) æˆ– \(c(1,0)=c(1,1)=1\)

è¿˜æ˜¯è€æ ·å­,å¦‚æœæœ‰ä¸€æ’ \(0\) æˆ–è€…ä¸€åˆ— \(0\) é‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µå°±æ²¡æœ‰é€†,é‚£ä¹ˆå¯ ä»¥æ„é€ å‡º:

1.3 Xor å·ç§¯

èµ·ç‚¹ : \(c(i,j)c(i,k)=c(i,j\ \text{xor}\ k)\)

  • å¯¹äºä»»æ„çš„ \(x,y\) ,å‡æœ‰ \(c(0,0)c(x,y)=c(x,y\ \text{xor}\ 0)=c(x,y)\) \(\Rightarrow c(0,0)=1\).
  • \(c(1,1)c(1,1)=c(1,0)\) æ­¤æ—¶è‹¥ \(c(1,1)=c(1,0)=0\),åˆ™ä¸€è¡Œä¸º \(0\) ,çŸ©é˜µæ— é€†ã€‚ æ‰€ä»¥ \(c(1,1),c(1,0)\) å¿…ç„¶éƒ½é \(0\)ã€‚
  • \(c(1,0)c(1,1)=c(1,1)\) åˆšæ‰è¯´\(c(1,1)\) é \(0\),æ‰€ä»¥æ­¤å¤„ \(c(1,0)\) ä¸€å®šæ˜¯1.
  • \(c(0,1)c(0,1)=c(0,0)\) \(\Rightarrow c(0,1)âˆˆ\{-1,1\}\)

ä¸¤ç§æƒ…å†µ : \(\begin{bmatrix}1&1\\-1&1\end{bmatrix}\) æˆ–

\(\begin{bmatrix}1&1\\1&-1\end{bmatrix}\) ,ä¸‹é¢é‡‡ç”¨ç¬¬äºŒç§ã€‚

é™„ ï¼šä¸éš¾è§‚å¯Ÿå‡º \(c(i,j)=(-1)^{|i\&j|}\)

\(FWT(A)_i=FWT(A_0)_i+FWT(A_1)_i\)

\(FWT(A)_{i+(n/2)}=FWT(A_0)_i-FWT(A_1)_{i}\)

æ±‚é€†å¯å¾—\(\begin{bmatrix}0.5&0.5\\0.5&-0.5\end{bmatrix}\)

\(IFWT(A)_{i+(n/2)}=\dfrac{IFWT(A_0)_i-IFWT(A_1)_i}{2}\)

0x03.\(\rm FWT\) å˜æ¢çš„ä¸€äº›æ€§è´¨

å‰é¢è®²äº†, \(\rm FWT\) å˜æ¢çš„æœ¬è´¨æ˜¯çº¿æ€§å˜æ¢ã€‚

è¿™æ„å‘³ç€ \(FWT(A+B)=FWT(A)+FWT(B)\) ,ä¸” \(FWT(cA)=cFWT(A)\)

æ­¤å¤–,å¦‚æœéœ€è¦å·ç§¯çš„å‘é‡åªæœ‰å°‘æ•°é \(0\) é¡¹( \(2,3\) ä¸ª)å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰åˆ†ç±»è®¨è®ºçš„ç¥å¥‡çš„è§£æ³•ã€‚

ä¾‹é¢˜(æˆ‘åªèƒ½åšåˆ°è¿™äº›äº†):

CF449D Jzzhu and Numbers + é¢˜è§£Link

CF1119H Triple + é¢˜è§£Link

é¢˜åšå¤šäº†å†æ¥å¡«å‘å§ã€‚

0x04.ä½å€¼åŸŸçš„æ‰©å±•

å…¶å®ä½è¿ç®—çš„æœ¬è´¨æ˜¯å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ª \(n\) ç»´ \(01\) å‘é‡çš„è¿ç®—ã€‚

æˆ–è¿ç®—å°±æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€ç»´å– \(\max\)ã€‚ä¸”è¿ç®—å°±æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€ç»´å– \(min\)ã€‚

å¼‚æˆ–è¿ç®—åˆ™æ˜¯æ¯ä¸€ç»´å¯¹åº”ç›¸åŠ å† \(\bmod\ 2\)ã€‚

ä½è¿ç®—æœ‰ä¸ªç‰¹ç‚¹ : å‘é‡çš„æ¯ä¸€ä½éƒ½æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠ\(\{0,1\}\)æ‰©å±•åˆ° \([0,k)âˆ©Z\) ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯æ‰©å±•åˆ° \(k\) è¿›åˆ¶ï¼Œçœ‹çœ‹ä¼šå¾—åˆ°ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ

æ¯ä¸€ç»´å– \(\bf max\)

å¯¹åº”åŸæ¥çš„æŒ‰ä½ \(\rm or\)ã€‚å¯å¾— \(c(x,y)c(x,y)=c(x,max(y,y))=c(x,y)\)

æ‰€ä»¥æ•´ä¸ªçŸ©é˜µä¸­åªæœ‰ \(0\) æˆ– \(1\)ã€‚

åˆå¯å¾— \(c(x,y1)c(x,y2)=c(x,max(y1,y2))\)

å‡å¦‚æœ‰ \(c(x,y1)=1,\ c(x,y2)=0\),å¯å¾— \(c(x,y1)c(x,y2)=c(x,max(y1,y2))\)

åˆå› ä¸º \(1*0=0\) æ‰€ä»¥ \(max(y1,y2)=y2\) ,å¯å¾— \(y1<y2\).

ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¯´ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€è¡Œä»¥å†…ï¼Œ \(1\) æ€»æ˜¯åœ¨ \(0\) çš„å‰é¢ã€‚

æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œé™¤äº†çŸ©é˜µæœ‰é€†ä¹‹å¤–,å†æ²¡æœ‰åˆ«çš„è¦æ±‚äº†ã€‚

å¦‚æœè¦æœ‰é€†çš„è¯ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€è¡Œéƒ½å¿…é¡»ä¸åŒï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆ \(1\) çš„ä¸ªæ•°åˆ†åˆ«å°±æ˜¯ \(1...n\),éšæ„æ’åˆ—éƒ½å¯ä»¥ã€‚

#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#define MaxN 1050000
using namespace std;
const int mod=1000000009;
int read(){
  int X=0;char ch=0;
  while(ch<48||ch>57)ch=getchar();
  while(ch>=48&&ch<=57)X=X*10+(ch^48),ch=getchar();
  return X;
}
int m;
struct Poly
{
  int a[21];
  void operator += (const Poly &B){
    for (int i=0;i<=m;i++)
      a[i]=(a[i]+B.a[i])%mod;
  }
  void operator -= (const Poly &B){
    for (int i=0;i<=m;i++)
      a[i]=(a[i]-B.a[i])%mod;
  }
  Poly operator * (const Poly &B) const{
    Poly R;
    for (int i=0;i<=m;i++)R.a[i]=0;
    for (int i=0;i<=m;i++)
      for (int j=0;i+j<=m;j++)
        R.a[i+j]=(R.a[i+j]+1ll*a[i]*B.a[j])%mod;
    return R;
  }
};
void DWT(Poly *f,int n)
{
  for (int l=1;l<n;l<<=1)
    for (int p=0;p<n;p+=l+l)
      for (int k=0;k<l;k++)
        f[p|l|k]+=f[p|k];
}
void IDWT(Poly *f,int n)
{
  for (int l=1;l<n;l<<=1)
    for (int p=0;p<n;p+=l+l)
      for (int k=0;k<l;k++)
        f[p|l|k]-=f[p|k];
}
Poly F[MaxN],G[MaxN],T[MaxN];
int n,c[MaxN];
int main()
{
  m=read();n=(1<<m);
  for (int i=1;i<n;i++)c[i]=c[i>>1]+(i&1);
  for (int i=0;i<n;i++)F[i].a[c[i]]=read();
  for (int i=0;i<n;i++)G[i].a[c[i]]=read();
  DWT(F,n);DWT(G,n);
  for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
    F[i]=F[i]*G[i];
  IDWT(F,n);
  for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
    printf("%d ",(F[i].a[c[i]]+mod)%mod);
  return 0;
}

    • \(\bf exp,ln\) è®¾æœ‰é›†åˆå¹‚çº§æ•° \(F\) ï¼Œæ¨¡ä»¿å¤šé¡¹å¼çº§æ•°æ¥å®šä¹‰å…¶ \(\exp,\ln\)ã€‚ å®šä¹‰ \(\exp F=\sum\limits_{k=0}\dfrac{F^k}{k!}\) ,è¦æ±‚\([x^{\varnothing}]F=0\) ã€‚ å®šä¹‰ \(\ln F\) ä¸º \(\exp\) çš„é€†è¿ç®—ï¼Œè¦æ±‚ \([x^{\varnothing}]F=1\)ã€‚ ä¹Ÿæœ‰å®šä¹‰å¼ \(\ln F=\sum\limits_{k=1}\dfrac{(-1)^{k+1}(F- x^{\varnothing})^k}{k}\) ä¹Ÿåªéœ€è¦å˜æ¢åå¯¹å ä½å¤šé¡¹å¼è¿›è¡Œ \(\exp,\ln\) å³å¯è®¡ç®—ã€‚ é›†åˆå¹‚çº§æ•°çš„è¿ç®—ä¹Ÿæœ‰å’Œç”Ÿæˆå‡½æ•°ç±»ä¼¼çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰ã€‚

  • ä¾‹é¢˜â‘  ï¼š P6570 ä¼˜ç§€å­åºåˆ—

ä¸éš¾å‘ç°ï¼Œå¯¹äºåºåˆ—ä¸­çš„ \(A[i]\) å†™å‡ºé›†åˆå¹‚çº§æ•°\((x^{\varnothing}+x^{A[i]})\) ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬çš„ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯å‡ºæ‰€æœ‰é›†åˆå¹‚çº§æ•°çš„å·ç§¯ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘æ¨¡ä»¿å¿«é€Ÿ \(01\) èƒŒåŒ…çš„å¥—è·¯ï¼Œå¯¹å…¶å…ˆå– \(\ln\) å \(\exp\)ã€‚ \(P(x)=\prod\limits_{i=1}^n(x^{\varnothing}+x^{A[i]})\) \(=\exp\sum\limits_{i=1}^n\ln(x^{\varnothing}+x^{A[i]})\) \(=\exp\sum\limits_{i=1}^n\sum\limits_{k=1}\dfrac{(-1)^{k+1}(x^{A[i]})^k}{k}\)

è€Œ \((x^{A[i]})^k\) æ˜¾ç„¶åªæœ‰ \(k=1\) æ—¶ä¸º \(x^{A[i]}\) ï¼Œå…¶ä»–æƒ…å†µä¸º \(0\)ã€‚ï¼ˆæ³¨ æ„è¿™æ˜¯å­é›†å·ç§¯ï¼‰ \(=\exp\sum\limits_{i=1}^nx^{A[i]}\)

ä¼¼ä¹å˜æˆ \(\exp\) æ¿å­äº†å‘¢â€¦â€¦

ä¸è¿‡è¦æ³¨æ„å¯¹ \(A[i]=0\) çš„æƒ…å†µç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ã€‚

  • ä¾‹é¢˜â‘¡ ï¼š Loj#154. é›†åˆåˆ’åˆ†è®¡æ•°

ä¸éš¾å‘ç°â€œåˆ’åˆ†â€œå°±å¯¹åº”ç”Ÿæˆæ— åºé›†åˆï¼Œè¿™å³ä¸º \({\exp}\) çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰ã€‚

æœ¬é¢˜è¦æ±‚åˆ’åˆ†çš„é›†åˆæ•° \({\leq k}\), åˆ™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ† \({\exp}\) :

\({ \sum_{i=0}^{k} \frac{F(x)^{k}}{k !} }\)

å¯¹å ä½å¤šé¡¹å¼åšéƒ¨åˆ† \({\exp}\) å³å¯ã€‚

æœ‰ \(\rm ODE\) : \(G=\sum\limits_{i=0}^k\dfrac{F^k}{k!}\Rightarrow G'=F'*\big(G-(F^k/k!)\big)\)

å¸¸æ•°è«åå…¶å¦™çš„å¤§ï¼Œè·‘ä¸è¿‡ \({O\left(2^{n} n^{3}\right)}\) å®é”¤â€¦..

è¯„æµ‹è®°å½•

  • ä¾‹é¢˜â‘¢ ï¼š Uoj#94. ã€é›†è®­é˜Ÿäº’æµ‹2015ã€‘èƒ¡ç­–çš„ç»Ÿè®¡

è®¾ \(G[s]\) ä¸ºç‚¹é›† \(s\) çš„è”é€šç”Ÿæˆå­å›¾ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œ\(F[s]\) ä¸ºç‚¹é›† \(s\) çš„ç”Ÿæˆ å­å›¾ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

\(F\) æ˜¯æ˜“æ±‚çš„ï¼Œæœ‰ \(F[s]=2^{\text{så†…éƒ¨è¾¹æ•°}}\)ã€‚

æ ¹æ® \(\exp\) çš„ç»„åˆæ„ä¹‰æ˜¾ç„¶æœ‰ \(F=\exp G\) ï¼Œåˆ™ \(G=\ln F\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(P[s]\) ä¸ºç‚¹é›† \(s\) çš„ç”Ÿæˆå­å›¾çš„è¿é€šå€¼ä¹‹å’Œã€‚

æšä¸¾è¿é€šå—æ•°ç›®åˆ™æœ‰ \(P=\sum\limits_{k=0}\dfrac{G^k}{k!}k!=\dfrac{1}{1- G}\)ã€‚

æ±‚é€†å³å¯ã€‚

è¯„æµ‹è®°å½•

  • ä¾‹é¢˜â‘£ ï¼š Loj#3165. ã€ŒCEOI2019ã€æ¸¸ä¹å›­

èƒ½å¤Ÿå‘ç°æ— ç¯å›¾æ‰€æœ‰è¾¹åå‘ä¹‹åè¿˜æ˜¯æ— ç¯å›¾ï¼Œäº’åçš„ä¸€å¯¹å›¾ç¿»è½¬è¾¹æ•°å’Œ æ°ä¸º \(m\)ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥ç­”æ¡ˆä¸ºæ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ä¹˜ä»¥ \(m/2\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(F[s]\) è¡¨ç¤ºç‚¹é›† \(s\) å†…é€‚å½“åè½¬åæ— ç¯çš„æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘æ‹† \(\rm DAG\) ä¸ºå­é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å»é™¤å…¥åº¦ä¸º \(0\) çš„æ‰€æœ‰ç‚¹ã€‚

é’¦å®šå…¥åº¦ä¸º \(0\) çš„ç‚¹é›† \(t\subseteq s\) ï¼Œ\(t\) å†…éƒ¨å¿…é¡»æ²¡æœ‰è¾¹ï¼Œå³ \(t\) ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹é›†ã€‚

\(t\) å’Œå…¶ä½™ç‚¹ \(s-t\) ä¹‹é—´çš„è¾¹æ–¹å‘ç¡®å®šã€‚æ‰€ä»¥æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°ä¸º \([t\text{æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹ é›†}]F[s-t]\)

ç”±äºæˆ‘ä»¬åªèƒ½é’¦å®šä¸€äº›ç‚¹å…¥åº¦ä¸º \(0\) ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿˜éœ€å®¹æ–¥ã€‚

å¯å¾— \(F[s]=\sum\limits_{t\subseteq s}(-1)^{|t|-1}[t\text{æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹é›†}]F[s-t]\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(G=(-1)^{|t|-1}[t\text{æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹é›†}]\)

å³ \(F=F*G+1\)ã€‚å¯å¾— \(F=\dfrac{1}{1-G}\)ï¼Œæ±‚é€†å³å¯ã€‚

è¯„æµ‹è®°å½•

  • ä¾‹é¢˜â‘¤ ï¼š #6673. EntropyIncreaser ä¸å±±æ—

å¯èƒ½è¦å…ˆå» å¤šé¡¹å¼è®¡æ•°æ‚è°ˆ çœ‹çœ‹æ€ä¹ˆæ•°æ¬§æ‹‰å›¾ã€‚

é¦–å…ˆè¦æ±‚å‡ºå¶åº¦å›¾çš„é›†åˆå¹‚çº§æ•°ï¼Œç„¶åæ±‚ \(\ln\) å³å¯å¾—åˆ°æ¬§æ‹‰å›¾ã€‚

ç°åœ¨é—®é¢˜å˜ä¸ºå¯¹æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹é›†æ±‚ç”Ÿæˆå¶åº¦å›¾ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

æ‰¾å‡ºä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—ï¼Œå°†å…¶ä½™çš„è¾¹éšæ„é€‰å–ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶èƒ½å¾—åˆ°ç›®å‰æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹ çš„å¥‡å¶æ€§ã€‚

ç”±äºæ£®æ—æ— ç¯çš„æ€§è´¨ï¼Œæ¯ç§ç”µåº¦å¥‡å¶æ€§éƒ½èƒ½é€šè¿‡æ°å½“åœ°é€‰å–æ£®æ—ä¸­ çš„è¾¹å¾—åˆ°ï¼Œä¸”æ–¹æ¡ˆæ•°æ°å¥½ä¸º \(1\)ã€‚

å› æ­¤ï¼Œå¶åº¦å›¾ä¸ªæ•°ä¸º \(2^{\text{è¾¹æ•°}-\text{ç”Ÿæˆæ£®æ—è¾¹æ•°}}\)ã€‚

item.title: [Codeforces938G]Shortest Path Queries
item.description:
HolyK's Blog https://blog.asukakyle.top/post/cf938g/ -

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå¸¦æƒæ— å‘å›¾ï¼Œå®ç°ä¸‰ç§æ“ä½œï¼šåŠ è¾¹ï¼Œåˆ è¾¹ï¼Œè¯¢é—®ä¸¤ç‚¹é—´çš„å¼‚æˆ–æœ€çŸ­è·¯ã€‚

\(n, m, q \leq 2\times 10^5\)ã€‚

ç±»ä¼¼æœ€å¤§ xor å’Œè·¯å¾„ï¼Œç”¨çº¿æ€§åŸºå¯ä»¥æ±‚è§£å¼‚æˆ–æœ€çŸ­è·¯ã€‚

å› ä¸ºçº¿æ€§åŸºåˆ é™¤å¾ˆéº»çƒ¦ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ç›´æ¥ç¦»çº¿ç”¨çº¿æ®µæ ‘åˆ†æ²»ã€‚

å›¾å¯èƒ½ä¸è¿é€šï¼Œéœ€è¦ç”¨å¹¶æŸ¥é›†ç»´æŠ¤è¿é€šæ€§ï¼Œç„¶åè®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªç‚¹åˆ°å½“å‰æ ¹çš„å¼‚æˆ–å’Œ \(d_x\)ã€‚

åŠ è¾¹æ—¶è®¾ \(val = d_x\oplus d_y \oplus w\)ï¼Œå¦‚æœ \(x, y\) å·²ç»è”é€šåˆ™å°† \(val\) åŠ å…¥å½“å‰è”é€šå—çš„çº¿æ€§åŸºï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªå¹¶æŸ¥é›†ï¼Œè¿æ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ¹ï¼Œè¾¹æƒä¸º \(val\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(2e5 + 5);
PII query[N];
#define ls o << 1
#define rs o << 1 | 1
std::vector<std::array<int, 3>> g[N << 2];
void update(int o, int l, int r, int x, int y, int u, int v, int w) {
  if (r < x || l > y) return;
  if (x <= l && r <= y) {
    g[o].push_back({u, v, w});
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  update(ls, l, m, x, y, u, v, w), update(rs, m + 1, r, x, y, u, v, w);
}
std::vector<std::pair<int*, int>> changes;
void record(int &x) { changes.emplace_back(&x, x); }
void rollBack(size_t t) {
  while (changes.size() > t) {
    *changes.back().first = changes.back().second;
    changes.pop_back();
  }
} 

int fa[N], siz[N], val[N];
int find(int &x) {
  int r = val[x];
  while (x != fa[x]) r ^= val[x = fa[x]];
  return r;
}
void ins(int *p, int x) {
  if (!x) return;
  for (int i = 29; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (x >> i & 1 ^ 1) continue;
    if (!p[i]) {
      record(p[i]);
      p[i] = x;
      break;
    }
    x ^= p[i];
  }
}
int p[N][30];
void solve(int o, int l, int r) {
  size_t now = changes.size();
  for (auto [x, y, z] : g[o]) {
    int r = find(x) ^ find(y) ^ z;
    if (x == y) {
      ins(p[x], r);
    } else {
      if (siz[x] > siz[y]) std::swap(x, y);
      record(fa[x]), record(siz[y]), record(val[x]);
      fa[x] = y, siz[y] += siz[x], val[x] ^= r;
      for (int i = 0; i < 30; i++) ins(p[y], p[x][i]);
    }
  }
  if (l == r) {
    auto [x, y] = query[l];
    if (x) {
      int ans = find(x) ^ find(y);
      assert(x == y);
      for (int i = 29; i >= 0; i--) smin(ans, ans ^ p[x][i]);
      std::cout << ans << "\n";
    }
    rollBack(now);
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  solve(ls, l, m), solve(rs, m + 1, r);
  rollBack(now);
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, m;
  std::cin >> n >> m;
  std::map<PII, PII> t;
  while (m--) {
    int x, y, z;
    std::cin >> x >> y >> z;
    t[PII(x, y)] = {0, z};
  }
  std::cin >> m;
  for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
    int opt, x, y;
    std::cin >> opt >> x >> y;
    if (opt == 1) {
      int z;
      std::cin >> z;
      t[PII(x, y)] = {i, z};
    } else if (opt == 2) {
      auto [l, w] = t[PII(x, y)];
      update(1, 1, m, l, i - 1, x, y, w);
      t.erase(PII(x, y));
    } else {
      query[i] = {x, y};
    }
  }
  for (auto &[u, v] : t) {
    auto &[x, y] = u;
    auto &[l, w] = v;
    update(1, 1, m, l, m, x, y, w);
  }
  std::iota(fa, fa + 1 + n, 0);
  std::fill(siz, siz + 1 + n, 1);
  solve(1, 1, m);
  return 0;
}

item.title: Gym102994
item.description:
HolyK's Blog https://blog.asukakyle.top/post/gym102994/ -

æ€»è§ˆ

é¢˜å· A B C D E F G H I J K L M
å®Œæˆæƒ…å†µ 1 1 0 1 1 1 1 0 0 1 1 1 0

A. Everyone Loves Playing Games

A æœ‰ \(N\) å¯¹æ•°ï¼Œ B æœ‰ \(M\) å¯¹æ•°ï¼ŒA ä» \(N\) å¯¹æ•°ä¸­åˆ†åˆ«é€‰ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å¾—åˆ°å¼‚æˆ–å’Œ \(X\)ï¼Œç„¶å B ä» \(N\) å¯¹æ•°å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚æˆ–å’Œ \(Y\)ï¼Œ\(A\) å¸Œæœ› \(X \oplus Y\) æœ€å¤§ï¼Œ\(B\) å¸Œæœ› \(X \oplus Y\) æœ€å°ï¼Œæ±‚æœ€åçš„ç»“æœã€‚

\(N, M \leq 10000, 0 \leq x \leq 10^{18}\)ã€‚

è®¾æ¯å¯¹æ•°ä¸º \((x_i, y_i)\)ï¼Œå…ˆéƒ½é€‰ä¸Š \(x_i\)ï¼Œç„¶åå˜æˆé€‰æˆ–ä¸é€‰ \(x_i \oplus y_i\) çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚

A å’Œ B åˆ†åˆ«å»ºå‡ºçº¿æ€§åŸºï¼Œç„¶åä»é«˜ä½å‘ä½ä½è€ƒè™‘ã€‚

åªéœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘æŸä¸€ä½ A å’Œ B éƒ½æœ‰å½±å“çš„æƒ…å†µï¼Œè¿™ä½å¦‚æœä¸º 1 é‚£ä¹ˆ A B åªä¼šé€‰ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸º 0 åˆ™è¦ä¹ˆéƒ½é€‰ï¼Œè¦ä¹ˆéƒ½ä¸é€‰ï¼Œä¸ç®¡å“ªç§æƒ…å†µä¸¤ç§çŠ¶æ€éƒ½å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å¼‚æˆ– \(A_i \oplus B_i\) æ¥ç›¸äº’è½¬æ¢ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µå°† \(A_i \oplus B_i\) æ’å…¥ \(A\) çš„çº¿æ€§åŸºæ¥æä¾›â€œåæ‚”â€çš„æœºä¼šã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#include <string.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

struct LinearBasis {
  LL p[61];
  LinearBasis() {
    memset(p, 0, sizeof p);
  }
  void ins(LL x) {
    for (int i = 60; i >= 0; i--) {
      if (x >> i & 1 ^ 1) continue;
      if (!p[i]) {
        p[i] = x;
        break;
      }
      x ^= p[i];
    }
  }
};
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, m;
    std::cin >> n >> m;
    LinearBasis p, q;
    LL ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      LL x, y;
      std::cin >> x >> y;
      ans ^= x;
      p.ins(x ^ y);
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
      LL x, y;
      std::cin >> x >> y;
      ans ^= x;
      q.ins(x ^ y);
    }
    for (int i = 60; i >= 0; i--) {
      auto a = p.p[i], b = q.p[i];
      ans = std::max(std::min(ans ^ a, ans ^ a ^ b), std::min(ans, ans ^ b));
      if ((a & b) >> i & 1) p.ins(a ^ b);
    }
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

B. Gifted Composer

æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œåœ¨å¼€å¤´æˆ–ç»“å°¾åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ï¼Œç„¶åæ±‚å½“å‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å¾ªç¯èŠ‚ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

\(n \leq 10^6\)ã€‚

é•¿åº¦ä¸º \(x\) çš„å¾ªç¯èŠ‚ä¸€å®šåœ¨ç¬¬ \(x\) æ¬¡æ“ä½œåå‡ºç°ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨æŸä¸€æ—¶é—´æ¶ˆå¤±ï¼Œåé¢ä¸ä¼šå†å‡ºç°ã€‚

æšä¸¾ \(x\) ç„¶åäºŒåˆ†è¿™ä¸ªæ¶ˆå¤±çš„æ—¶é—´ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­å¾ªç¯èŠ‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨é•¿åº¦ \(n - x\) çš„ Border æ¥å®ç°ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n \log n)\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

constexpr uint32_t P(1e9 + 7);
using Hash = std::pair<uint64_t, uint64_t>;
inline Hash operator+(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first + b.first, (a.second + b.second) % P}; 
}
inline Hash operator-(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first - b.first, (a.second + P - b.second) % P}; 
}
inline Hash operator*(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first * b.first, a.second * b.second % P};
}
constexpr Hash Base(131, 31);
constexpr int N(1e6 + 5);
Hash pw[N];
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
  std::cin.tie(0);
  int n;
  std::cin >> n;
  int l = 0;
  std::deque<char> s;
  std::string opt;
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    std::string a, b;
    std::cin >> a >> b;
    opt += a;
    if (a[0] == 'p') {
      l++, s.push_front(b[0] + (b[1] == 'i'));
    } else {
      s.push_back(b[0] + (b[1] == 'i'));
    }
  }
  pw[0] = {1, 1};
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) pw[i] = pw[i - 1] * Base;
  std::vector<Hash> h(n); h[0] = {s[0], s[0]};
  for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) h[i] = h[i - 1] * Base + Hash(s[i], s[i]);
  std::vector<std::pair<int, int>> interval;
  interval.reserve(n);
  int r = l - 1;
  for (char c : opt) {
    if (c == 'p') {
      l--;
    } else {
      r++;
    }
    interval.emplace_back(l, r);
  }
  assert(interval.size() == n);
  std::vector<int> ans(n + 1);
  auto get = [&](int l, int r) {
    return l <= r ? h[r] - (l ? h[l - 1] * pw[r - l + 1] : Hash()) : Hash();
  };
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    l = i, r = n;
    while (l < r) {
      int m = l + r >> 1;
      auto [x, y] = interval[m];
      if (get(x, y - i - 1) == get(x + i + 1, y)) {
        l = m + 1;
      } else {
        r = m;
      }
    }
    ans[i]++, ans[l]--;
  }
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) ans[i] += ans[i - 1], std::cout << ans[i - 1] << "\n";
  
  return 0;
}

D. String Theory

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² \(S\)ï¼Œå’Œæ•´æ•° \(k\)ï¼Œæ±‚å½¢å¦‚ \(AAA\dots A\) ï¼ˆ\(k\) ä¸ª \(A\)ï¼‰çš„å­ä¸²çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ \(A\) æ˜¯ä»»æ„éç©ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ã€‚

\(n \leq 3 \times 10^5, 1 \leq k \leq 20\)ã€‚

æšä¸¾å¾ªç¯èŠ‚é•¿åº¦ \(i\)ï¼Œæšä¸¾å·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ \(l\)ï¼Œå³ç«¯ç‚¹ \(r\) å¯ä»¥äºŒåˆ†å¾—å‡ºï¼Œç„¶åè¿™ä¸ªè´¡çŒ®æ˜¯ \(r - l + 1 - ki + 1\)ï¼Œå‘ç°ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªå·¦ç«¯ç‚¹ä¸€å®šåœ¨åŒºé—´ \([r - k + 1, r + 1]\)ï¼Œæ€»æšä¸¾æ¬¡æ•°æ˜¯è°ƒå’Œçº§æ•°ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n \log^2 n)\)ã€‚

\(k \leq 20\) çš„æ¡ä»¶å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯æ²¡ç”¨çš„ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
constexpr uint32_t P(1e9 + 7);
using Hash = std::pair<uint64_t, uint64_t>;
inline Hash operator+(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first + b.first, (a.second + b.second) % P}; 
}
inline Hash operator-(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first - b.first, (a.second + P - b.second) % P}; 
}
inline Hash operator*(Hash a, Hash b) {
  return {a.first * b.first, a.second * b.second % P};
}
constexpr Hash Base(131, 31);
constexpr int N(3e5 + 5);
Hash pw[N];
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
  std::cin.tie(0);
  int t, k = 3e5;
  pw[0] = {1, 1};
  for (int i = 1; i <= k; i++) pw[i] = pw[i - 1] * Base;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    std::string s;
    std::cin >> k >> s;
    int n = s.length();
    if (k == 1) {
      std::cout << 1LL * n * (n + 1) / 2 << "\n";
      continue;
    }
    std::vector<Hash> h(n);
    h[0] = {s[0], s[0]};
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) h[i] = h[i - 1] * Base + Hash(s[i], s[i]);
    auto get = [&](int l, int r) {
      return l <= r ? h[r] - (l ? h[l - 1] * pw[r - l + 1] : Hash()) : Hash();
    };
    auto check = [&](int l, int r, int x) {
      return get(l, r - x) == get(l + x, r);
    };
    long long ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1, l, r; i <= n; i++) {
      for (int j = 0; j <= n - i; j = r + 1) {
        l = std::max(0, j - i + 1), r = j;
        while (l < r) {
          int m = l + r >> 1;
          if (check(m, j + i - 1, i)) {
            r = m;
          } else {
            l = m + 1;
          }
        }
        r = j;
        if (n - 1 > r) {
          for (int k = 1 << std::__lg(n - 1 - r); k; k >>= 1) {
            if (r + k < n && check(l, r + k, i)) r += k;
          }
        }
        assert(r >= j + i - 1);
        ans += std::max(0, r - l + 1 - k * i + 1);
      }
    }
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

E. Road Construction

F. Girlfriend

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªæ— å‘å›¾ï¼Œq æ¬¡è¯¢é—® \(s\) åˆ° \(t\) çš„æ¬¡å¤§è¾¹æƒçš„æœ€å°å€¼ã€‚

\(n, q \leq 10^5, m \leq 2 \times 10^5\)ã€‚

äºŒåˆ†ç­”æ¡ˆ \(ans\)ï¼Œé—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨ä¸€æ¡è¾¹è¿æ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªè”é€šå—ï¼ˆ\(s\) å’Œ \(t\) åªèµ°å°äºç­‰äº \(ans\) çš„è¾¹å½¢æˆçš„è”é€šå—ï¼‰ã€‚

å»ºå‡º kruskal é‡æ„æ ‘å€å¢å³å¯æ±‚å‡ºè¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªè”é€šå—ã€‚

ç„¶ååˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨è¿æ¥ä¸¤ä¸ªå­æ ‘çš„è¾¹ï¼Œè½¬æ¢æˆ dfs åºåç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªäºŒç»´ååºçš„æ•°æ®ç»“æ„è§£å†³å³å¯ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n \log^2 n)\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

    constexpr int N(2e5 + 5);
int up[20][N], fa[N], in[N], out[N], cnt, val[N];
int find(int x) {
  while (x != fa[x]) x = fa[x] = fa[fa[x]];
  return x;
};
std::vector<int> g[N];
void dfs(int x) {
  in[x] = ++cnt;
  for (int y : g[x]) {
    // assert(!in[y]);
    dfs(y);
  }
  out[x] = cnt;
}

struct Node {
  int ls, rs, w;
} t[N * 50];
int pt;
void ins(int &o, int l, int r, int x) {
  t[++pt] = t[o], o = pt, t[o].w++;
  if (l == r) return;
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  x <= m ? ins(t[o].ls, l, m, x) : ins(t[o].rs, m + 1, r, x);
}
int ask(int u, int v, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (x <= l && r <= y) return t[v].w - t[u].w;
  int m = l + r >> 1, ans = 0;
  if (x <= m) ans += ask(t[u].ls, t[v].ls, l, m, x, y);
  if (y > m) ans += ask(t[u].rs, t[v].rs, m + 1, r, x, y);
  return ans;
}
int root[N];
bool check(int x, int y, int z) {
  for (int i = 18; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (up[i][x] && val[up[i][x]] <= z) x = up[i][x];
  }
  for (int i = 18; i >= 0; i--) {
    if (up[i][y] && val[up[i][y]] <= z) y = up[i][y];
  }
  return ask(root[in[x] - 1], root[out[x]], 1, cnt, in[y], out[y]) > 0;
}

int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
  std::cin.tie(0);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int n, m, q;
    cnt = pt = 0;
    std::cin >> n >> m >> q;
    std::iota(fa + 1, fa + 1 + 2 * n, 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n + n; i++) g[i].clear();
    std::vector<std::array<int, 3>> e(m);
    for (auto &[z, x, y] : e) std::cin >> x >> y >> z;
    std::sort(e.begin(), e.end());
    int id = n;
    for (auto [z, x, y] : e) {
      x = find(x), y = find(y);
      if (x == y) continue;
      fa[x] = fa[y] = ++id;
      g[id].push_back(x);
      g[id].push_back(y);
      up[0][x] = up[0][y] = id;
      val[id] = z;
      up[0][id] = 0;
    }

    for (int i = 1; i <= 18; i++)
      for (int j = 1; j <= id; j++) {
        up[i][j] = up[i - 1][up[i - 1][j]];
      }
    for (int i = n + 1; i <= id; i++) {
      if (!up[0][i]) dfs(i);
    }
    std::vector<std::vector<int>> h(id + 1);
    for (auto [z, x, y] : e) {
      h[in[x]].push_back(in[y]);
      h[in[y]].push_back(in[x]);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) {
      root[i] = root[i - 1];
      for (auto j : h[i]) ins(root[i], 1, cnt, j);
    }
    while (q--) {
      int x, y;
      std::cin >> x >> y;
      if (find(x) != find(y)) {
        std::cout << "-1\n";
        continue;
      }
      int l = 0, r = 1e9;
      while (l < r) {
        int m = l + r >> 1;
        if (check(x, y, m)) {
          r = m;
        } else {
          l = m + 1;
        }
      }
      std::cout << l << "\n";
    }
  }
  return 0;
}

G. Blackjack

æœ‰ \(n\) ä¸ªç‰©å“ï¼Œæƒå€¼ä¸º \(v_i\)ï¼Œæ¯è½®éšæœºæ‹¿èµ°ä¸€ä¸ªï¼Œç„¶åä½ å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©æ˜¯å¦è¿›è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€è½®ï¼Œæ±‚æœ€ä¼˜ç­–ç•¥ä¸‹ï¼Œæœ€åæ‹¿èµ°ç‰©å“çš„æƒå€¼å’Œåœ¨ \((a, b]\) åŒºé—´å†…çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚ \(n, v_i, a, b \leq 500\)ã€‚

æœ€ä¼˜ç­–ç•¥æ˜¾ç„¶å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ç›´æ‹¿ç›´åˆ°è½åˆ° \((a, b]\) ä¸Šï¼Œæˆ–è€…è¶…è¿‡äº† \(b\) æ¸¸æˆç»“æŸã€‚

é—®é¢˜è½¬åŒ–æˆéšæœºæ‹¿è‹¥å¹²ä¸ªç‰©å“ï¼Œæœ€åè½åœ¨ \((a, b]\)ï¼Œä¸”å€’æ•°ç¬¬äºŒæ­¥æ²¡æœ‰è½åœ¨ \((a, b]\) çš„æ¦‚ç‡ã€‚

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸ªèƒŒåŒ…é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå…ˆæ±‚å‡ºæ•´ä¸ªèƒŒåŒ…ï¼Œç„¶åæšä¸¾æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¿çš„ç‰©å“é€€èƒŒåŒ…å³å¯ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n^2b)\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, a, b;
  std::cin >> n >> a >> b;
  std::vector<std::vector<double>> f(1, std::vector<double>(b + 1)), g;
  f[0][0] = 1;
  std::vector<int> v(n);
  for (auto &x : v) {
    std::cin >> x;
    f.emplace_back(b + 1);
    for (int i = f.size() - 1; i; i--) {
      for (int j = b; j >= x; j--) {
        f[i][j] += f[i - 1][j - x] / (n - i + 1) * i;
      }
    }
  }
  double ans = 0;
  for (auto x : v) {
    g = f;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
      for (int j = x; j <= b; j++) {
        g[i][j] -= g[i - 1][j - x] / (n - i + 1) * i;
      }
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
      for (int j = std::max(a + 1, x); j - x <= a && j <= b; j++) {
        ans += g[i][j - x] / (n - i);
      }
    }
  }
  printf("%.10f\n", ans);
  return 0;
}

K. Data Structure

ç»™å®šä¸€æ£µæ ‘ï¼Œ\(q\) æ¬¡æ“ä½œï¼Œç¬¬ä¸€ç§æ“ä½œä¸º \(a, x, y, z\) è¡¨ç¤º \(a\) çš„å­æ ‘ä¸­è·ç¦» \(a\) æ¨¡ \(x\) ä½™ \(y\) çš„ç‚¹æƒå€¼åŠ  \(z\)ï¼Œç¬¬äºŒç§æ“ä½œä¸ºè¯¢é—® \(a\) çš„æƒå€¼ã€‚

\(n, q \leq 3\times 10^5\)ã€‚

å¦‚æœæš´åŠ›ä¿®æ”¹çš„è¯ä¸€ç§æ€è·¯æ˜¯æŒ‰æ·±åº¦å°†ç‚¹åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œç›´æ¥ \(\frac n x\) æ¬¡åŒºé—´ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œç„¶åå•ç‚¹æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚

å¦ä¸€ç§æ€è·¯æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªæ¨¡æ•°ç”¨dfsåºç»´æŠ¤å­æ ‘ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡åŒºé—´ä¿®æ”¹ \([in_a, out_a]\)ï¼ŒæŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶æšä¸¾æ¨¡æ•°å•ç‚¹æŸ¥è¯¢ã€‚

æŒ‰ \(x\) åˆ†ç±»ï¼Œå¤§äº \(X\) çš„ç”¨ç¬¬ä¸€ç§ï¼Œå°äº \(X\) çš„ç”¨ç¬¬äºŒç§ã€‚

è®¾ä¸¤ç§å•æ¬¡ä¿®æ”¹æ—¶é—´åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º \(C_1(n), C_2(n)\)ï¼Œå•æ¬¡æŸ¥è¯¢æ—¶é—´åˆ†åˆ«ä¸º \(Q_1(n), Q_2(n)\)ï¼Œåˆ™æ€»å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º

\[ O\left(q\left[\frac{n}{X} C_1(n) + C_2(n) + Q_1(n) + XQ_2(n)\right]\right) \]

å– \(X = \sqrt\frac{nC_1(n)}{Q_2(n)}\)ï¼Œæœ€ä¼˜å¤æ‚åº¦ä¸º \[ O\left(q\left[\sqrt{nC_1(n)Q_2(n)} + C_2(n) + Q_1(n)\right]\right) \]

å¦‚æœ \(C_1(n) = Q_2(n) = O(1), C_2(n) = Q_1(n) = O(\sqrt n)\)ï¼Œå¯ä»¥åšåˆ° \(O(q \sqrt n)\)ã€‚

è¿™é¢˜æˆ‘ç°åœºå†™äº†æ ‘çŠ¶æ•°ç»„å’Œçº¿æ®µæ ‘ï¼Œ\(O(q \sqrt n \log n)\)ï¼Œä¹Ÿè·‘è¿‡äº†ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

constexpr int N(3e5 + 5), T(233);

std::vector<int> g[N], h[N];
int in[N], out[N], dep[N], id[N], max_dep;
void dfs(int x) {
  max_dep = std::max(max_dep, dep[x]);
  in[x] = ++in[0];
  id[x] = h[dep[x]].size();
  h[dep[x]].push_back(in[x]);
  for (int y : g[x]) {
    dep[y] = dep[x] + 1;
    dfs(y);
  }
  out[x] = in[0];
}
struct FenwickTree {
  std::vector<int> c;
  FenwickTree(int n = -1) : c(n + 1) {}
  void add(int p, int x) {
    for (p++; p < c.size(); p += p & -p) c[p] += x;
  }
  int ask(int p) {
    int r = 0;
    for (p++; p; p -= p & -p) r += c[p];
    return r;
  }
} bit[N];

struct Node {
  int ls, rs, w;
} t[N * 100];
int cnt;
void ins(int &o, int l, int r, int x, int y, int z) {
  if (!o) t[o = ++cnt] = {0, 0, 0};
  if (x <= l && r <= y) {
    t[o].w += z;
    return;
  }
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  if (x <= m) ins(t[o].ls, l, m, x, y, z);
  if (y > m) ins(t[o].rs, m + 1, r, x, y, z);
}
int ask(int o, int l, int r, int x) {
  if (!o) return 0;
  if (l == r) return t[o].w;
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  return t[o].w + (x <= m ? ask(t[o].ls, l, m, x) : ask(t[o].rs, m + 1, r, x));
}
int n, root[T][T];
int ask(int a) {
  int ans = bit[dep[a]].ask(id[a]);
  for (int i = 1; i < T; i++) {
    ans += ask(root[i][dep[a] % i], 1, n, in[a]);
  }
  return ans;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
  std::cin.tie(0);
  int t;
  std::cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    int m;
    std::cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) g[i].clear(), h[i].clear();
    for (int i = 2, x; i <= n; i++) {
      std::cin >> x;
      g[x].push_back(i);
    }
    in[0] = 0;
    max_dep = 0;
    dfs(1);
    for (int i = 0; i <= max_dep; i++) bit[i] = FenwickTree(h[i].size());
    cnt = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < T; i++)
      for (int j = 0; j < i; j++) root[i][j] = 0;
    while (m--) {
      int opt, a;
      std::cin >> opt >> a;
      if (opt == 1) {
        int x, y, z;
        std::cin >> x >> y >> z;
        if (x >= T) {
          for (int i = dep[a] + y; i <= max_dep; i += x) {
            int l = std::lower_bound(h[i].begin(), h[i].end(), in[a]) -
                    h[i].begin();
            int r = std::upper_bound(h[i].begin(), h[i].end(), out[a]) -
                    h[i].begin();
            bit[i].add(l, z), bit[i].add(r, -z);
          }
        } else {
          ins(root[x][(y + dep[a]) % x], 1, n, in[a], out[a], z);
        }
      } else {
        std::cout << ask(a) << "\n";
      }
    }
  }
  return 0;
}

A. Template for Search

ç»™å®šç”±å°å†™å­—æ¯ã€å­—ç¬¦* å’Œ ? ç»„æˆçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸² \(s\)ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ * å¯ä»¥è¢«æ›¿æ¢æˆä»»æ„ä¸²ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ç©ºä¸²ï¼‰ï¼Œ? å¯ä»¥è¢«æ›¿æ¢æˆä»»æ„å­—ç¬¦ï¼Œæ±‚ \(s\) å¯ä»¥è¡¨ç¤ºæˆçš„æœ€çŸ­å›æ–‡ä¸²ã€‚

\(1 \leq |s| \leq 500\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(dp[l][r]\) è¡¨ç¤º \(l \dots r\) èƒ½ç»„æˆçš„æœ€çŸ­å›æ–‡ä¸²ï¼Œæœ‰ä¸‰ç§è½¬ç§»ï¼š

  • \(s_l\) åŒ¹é… \(s_r\)
  • \(s_l = *\) åŒ¹é…å³è¾¹ä¸€æ®µ
  • \(s_r = *\) åŒ¹é…å·¦è¾¹ä¸€æ®µ

B. Redistribution of Digits

C. Partial Sums

\(n \times m\) çŸ©é˜µåˆ— \(\{A_k\}\) æ»¡è¶³é€’æ¨å…³ç³» \[ A_k[i, j] = \sum_{u = 1}^i\sum_{v = 1}^jA_{k-1}[u, v] \bmod 2 \]

ç»™å‡º \(A_0\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \(\{A_k\}\) çš„æœ€å°å¾ªç¯èŠ‚ã€‚

\(1 \leq n \times m \leq 10^6\)

é€’æ¨å…³ç³»æ˜¯äºŒç»´å‰ç¼€å’Œã€‚æ•°åˆ— \(a_n\) åš \(k\) æ¬¡å‰ç¼€å’Œçš„ç»“æœæ˜¯ \[ a'_n = \sum_{i = 1}^na_i\binom{n - i + k - 1}{n - i} \] è¿™ä¸ªå¼å­å¯ä»¥è¿™æ ·æ¨å¯¼ï¼Œåˆå§‹ä¸º \(i\) æ¯æ­¥å¯ä»¥åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªéè´Ÿå€¼ï¼Œèµ° \(k\) æ­¥ï¼Œæ±‚ \(i\) åˆ° \(n\) çš„è·¯å¾„æ•°ï¼Œç­‰ä»·äº \(x_i+x_{i+1}+\dots+x_{n}=k, x_i, x_{i+1}, \dots, x_{n-1} \geq 0, x_n \geq 1\)ï¼Œç”¨éš”æ¿æ³•å¯å¾—ç­”æ¡ˆä¸º \(\dbinom{n - i + k - 1}{n - i}\)ã€‚

äºŒç»´ç›¸äº’ç‹¬ç«‹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ \[ A_k[i, j] = \sum_{u, v}A_0[u, v]\binom{i - u + k - 1}{i - u}\binom{j - v + k - 1}{j - v} \bmod 2 \]

ç”±å¢å¡æ–¯å®šç†ï¼Œå½“ \(k = 2^{d_0} > n\) æ—¶ï¼Œ\(\binom{i - u + k - 1}{i - u} \equiv 1 \pmod 2\)ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¾ªç¯èŠ‚æ˜¯ \(2^{d_0}\) çš„å› å­ã€‚

æšä¸¾å¾ªç¯èŠ‚ \(k = 2^d\)ï¼Œç”±å¢å¡æ–¯å®šç† \(\binom{i - u + k - 1}{i - u} \equiv 1 \pmod 2\) å½“ä¸”ä»…å½“ \(i - u = t \times 2^d\)ï¼Œå³ \(u = i - 2^dt\)ï¼Œç”¨äºŒç»´å‰ç¼€å’Œå¯ä»¥ \(O(nm)\) éªŒè¯ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(nm\log(nm))\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, m;
  std::cin >> n >> m;
  std::vector<std::vector<int>> a(n);
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
    a[i].resize(m);
    std::string s;
    std::cin >> s;
    for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) a[i][j] = s[j] - '0';
  }
  auto b = a;
  for (int k = 1; ; k <<= 1) {
    if ([&]{
      for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {
          b[i][j] = a[i][j];
          if (i >= k) b[i][j] ^= b[i - k][j];
          if (j >= k) b[i][j] ^= b[i][j - k];
          if (i >= k && j >= k) b[i][j] ^= b[i - k][j - k];
          if (b[i][j] ^ a[i][j]) return false;
        }
      return true;
    }()) {
      return std::cout << k << "\n", 0;
    }
    if (k > n && k > m) assert(false);
  }
  return 0;
}

D. Lis on Circle

\(n\) ä¸ªäººé¡ºæ—¶é’ˆå›´æˆä¸€åœˆï¼Œç¬¬ \(i\) ä¸ªäººæ‰‹ä¸Šæœ‰ \(m_i\) ä¸ªæ•° \(a_1, a_2, \dots, a_{m_i}\)ï¼Œä» 1 å¼€å§‹é¡ºæ—¶é’ˆè¿›è¡Œæ¸¸æˆï¼Œè½®åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªäººæ—¶ä»–å¯ä»¥é€‰æ‹©è·³è¿‡ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œä½†è¿™ä¸ªæ•°å¿…é¡»æ¯”ä¹‹å‰çš„äººå‡ºçš„æ•°å¤§ã€‚ä¸èƒ½æœ‰è¿ç»­è¶…è¿‡ \(k\) ä¸ªäººè·³è¿‡ï¼Œæ±‚æœ€å¤šèƒ½å‡ºå¤šå°‘æ•°ã€‚

\(0 \leq n, \sum m_i \leq 10^5, 0 \leq a_i \leq 10^9\)ã€‚

æŒ‰æ•°ä»å°åˆ°å¤§dpï¼Œè®¾ \(dp[i]\) è¡¨ç¤ºæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ˜¯ \(i\) å‡ºçš„ï¼Œæœ€å¤šå‡ºäº†å¤šå°‘æ•°ï¼Œè½¬ç§»æ˜¯åŒºé—´å– \(\min\) å’Œå•ç‚¹èµ‹å€¼ï¼Œçº¿æ®µæ ‘ç»´æŠ¤å³å¯ã€‚

æ³¨æ„æ²¡æœ‰æ•°çš„æç«¯æƒ…å†µã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(1e5 + 5);
PII max[N << 2];
#define ls o << 1
#define rs o << 1 | 1
void update(int o, int l, int r, int x, PII y) {
  smax(max[o], y);
  if (l == r) return;
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  x <= m ? update(ls, l, m, x, y) : update(rs, m + 1, r, x, y);
}
PII ask(int o, int l, int r, int x, int y) {
  if (l > r || r < x || l > y) return {-1e9, -1};
  if (x <= l && r <= y) return max[o];
  int m = l + r >> 1;
  return std::max(ask(ls, l, m, x, y), ask(rs, m + 1, r, x, y));
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, m, k;
  std::cin >> m >> k;
  std::vector<PII> a;
  for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
    int t, x;
    std::cin >> t;
    while (t--) {
      std::cin >> x;
      a.emplace_back(x, i);
    }
  }
  n = a.size();
  if (!n) return std::cout << "0\n", 0;
  std::sort(a.begin(), a.end());
  for (auto &[x ,y] : max) x = -1e9, y = -1;
  std::vector<PII> f(n, PII(-1e9, -1));
  update(1, 0, m, 0, {0, -1});
  for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < n; i++) {
    for (; j < i && a[j].first < a[i].first; j++) {
      update(1, 0, m, a[j].second, {f[j].first, j});
    }
    f[i] = std::max(ask(1, 0, m, a[i].second - k - 1, a[i].second - 1), ask(1, 0, m, a[i].second - k - 1 + m, m));
    f[i].first++;
    assert(f[i].second < i);
  }
  std::vector<int> ans;
  for (int i = std::max_element(f.begin(), f.end()) - f.begin(); i >= 0 && f[i].first >= 1; i = f[i].second) ans.emplace_back(i);
  std::reverse(ans.begin(), ans.end());
  std::cout << ans.size() << "\n";
  for (int i : ans) {
    std::cout << a[i].second << " " << a[i].first << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

E. Very Simple Sum

ç»™å®šæ•°åˆ— \(a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n, b_1, b_2, \dots, b_n\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \[ \sum_{1\leq x, y, z, w \leq n}(a_x+a_y+a_z+a_w)^{b_x\oplus b_y \oplus b_z \oplus b_w} \bmod 998244353 \]

\(1 \leq n \leq 10^5, 1 \leq a_i, b_i \leq 500\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(cnt[i][j]\) è¡¨ç¤º \(i^j\) é¡¹çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼ŒäºŒç»´å·ç§¯ \(C[n][m] = \sum_{x + y = n, z \oplus w = m}A[x][z]\times B[y][w]\)ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«ç”¨ \(FFT, FWT\) è®¡ç®—å³å¯ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(ab\log(ab))\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
template <class T>
inline void readInt(T &w) {
  char c, p = 0;
  while (!isdigit(c = getchar())) p = c == '-';
  for (w = c & 15; isdigit(c = getchar());) w = w * 10 + (c & 15);
  if (p) w = -w;
}
constexpr int P(998244353), G(3);
inline int&inc(int &x, int y) { return (x += y) >= P ? x -= P : x; }
inline int sum(int x, int y) { return x + y >= P ? x + y - P : x + y; }
inline int sub(int x, int y) { return x - y < 0 ? x - y + P : x - y; }
inline int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P)
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  return r;
}


using Polynom = std::vector<int>;
std::vector<int> w;
void getOmega(int k) {
  w.resize(k);
  w[0] = 1;
  int base = fpow(G, (P - 1) / (k << 1));
  for (int i = 1; i < k; i++) w[i] = 1LL * w[i - 1] * base % P;
}
void dft(int *a, int n) {
  assert((n & n - 1) == 0);
  for (int k = n >> 1; k; k >>= 1) {
    getOmega(k);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1) {
      for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
        int y = a[i + j + k];
        a[i + j + k] = (1LL * a[i + j] - y + P) * w[j] % P;
        inc(a[i + j], y);
      }
    }
  }
}
void dft(Polynom &a) { dft(a.data(), a.size()); }
void idft(int *a, int n) {
  assert((n & n - 1) == 0);
  for (int k = 1; k < n; k <<= 1) {
    getOmega(k);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1) {
      for (int j = 0; j < k; j++) {
        int x = a[i + j], y = 1LL * a[i + j + k] * w[j] % P;
        a[i + j] = sum(x, y), a[i + j + k] = sub(x, y);
      }
    }
  }
  for (int i = 0, inv = P - (P - 1) / n; i < n; i++) a[i] = 1LL * a[i] * inv % P;
  std::reverse(a + 1, a + n);
}
void idft(Polynom &a) { idft(a.data(), a.size()); }
void fwt(Polynom &a) {
  int n = a.size();
  assert((n & n - 1) == 0);
  for (int k = 1; k < n; k <<= 1)
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1)
      for (int j = 0, x, y; j < k; j++) {
        x = a[i + j], y = a[i + j + k];
        inc(a[i + j], y);
        a[i + j + k] = sum(x, P - y);
      }
}
void ifwt(Polynom &a) {
  int n = a.size();
  auto shift = [](int &x) { x = x & 1 ? x + P >> 1 : x >> 1; };
  for (int k = n >> 1; k; k >>= 1)
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i += k << 1)
      for (int j = 0, x, y; j < k; j++) {
        x = a[i + j], y = a[i + j + k];
        shift(inc(a[i + j], y));
        shift(a[i + j + k] = sum(x, P - y));
      }
}

int main() {
  int n;
  readInt(n);
  std::vector<int> a(n), b(n);
  for (int &x : a) readInt(x);
  for (int &x : b) readInt(x);
  std::vector<Polynom> c(512, Polynom(2048));
  for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) c[b[i]][a[i]]++;
  for (auto &v : c) dft(v);
  for (int j = 0; j < 2048; j++) {
    Polynom d(512);
    for (int i = 0; i < 512; i++) d[i] = c[i][j];
    fwt(d);
    for (int i = 0; i < 512; i++) d[i] = 1LL * d[i] * d[i] % P * d[i] % P * d[i] % P;
    ifwt(d);
    for (int i = 0; i < 512; i++) c[i][j] = d[i];
  }
  for (auto &v : c) idft(v);
  int ans = 0;
  for (int i = 0; i < 512; i++)
    for (int j = 0; j < 2048; j++)
      ans = (ans + 1LL * c[i][j] * fpow(j, i)) % P;
  std::cout << ans << "\n";
  return 0;
}

F. Random XOR

ç»™å®š \(a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n\)ï¼Œéšæœºä»ä¸­é€‰å–ä¸€äº›æ•°çš„å¼‚æˆ–å’Œä¸º \(s\)ï¼Œæ±‚ \(s^2\) çš„æœŸæœ›ï¼Œå¯¹ \(10^9+7\) å–æ¨¡ã€‚

\(n \leq 10^5\)ã€‚

è®¾ \(s = \sum_{i\geq 0}b_i2^i\)ï¼Œåˆ™ \[ \begin{aligned} s^2 &= \sum_{i, j}b_ib_j2^{i+j}\\ E(s^2) &= \sum_{i, j}P(b_i \And b_j)2^{i+j} \end{aligned} \]

\(P(b_i \And b_j)\) è¡¨ç¤º \(b_i, b_j\) åŒæ—¶ä¸º \(1\) çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ \(O(n)\) è®¡ç®—ã€‚

å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n \log^2(P))\)ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int P(1e9 + 7);
int fpow(int x, int k = P - 2) {
  int r = 1;
  for (; k; k >>= 1, x = 1LL * x * x % P) {
    if (k & 1) r = 1LL * r * x % P;
  }
  return r;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, t, m;
  std::cin >> n >> t >> m;
  m = 1LL * t * fpow(m) % P;
  std::vector<int> a(n);
  for (int &x : a) std::cin >> x;
  int ans = 0;
  for (int i = 0, x = 1; i <= 30; i++, x <<= 1)
    for (int j = 0, y = 1; j <= 30; j++, y <<= 1) {
      std::array<int, 4> p;
      p[0] = 1, p[1] = 0, p[2] = 0, p[3] = 0;
      for (int &x : a) {
        int v = (x >> i & 1) << 1 | (x >> j & 1);
        p = {
          static_cast<int>((1LL * p[v ^ 0] * m + 1LL * p[0] * (1 - m)) % P),
          static_cast<int>((1LL * p[v ^ 1] * m + 1LL * p[1] * (1 - m)) % P),
          static_cast<int>((1LL * p[v ^ 2] * m + 1LL * p[2] * (1 - m)) % P),
          static_cast<int>((1LL * p[v ^ 3] * m + 1LL * p[3] * (1 - m)) % P)
        };
      }
      ans = (ans + 1LL * p[3] * x % P * y) % P;
    }
  std::cout << (ans + P) % P << "\n";
  return 0;
}

G. Sum of Distances in Cactus

ç»™å®šä¸€æ£µè¾¹æƒä¸º 1 çš„ç‚¹ä»™äººæŒï¼Œæ±‚ä¸¤ç‚¹é—´æœ€çŸ­è·¯ä¹‹å’Œã€‚

\(n \leq 10^5\)ã€‚

å¯¹æ¯æ¡è¾¹ç®—è´¡çŒ®ï¼Œå¯¹äºæ¯ä¸ªç¯è®¡ç®— \(\sum_{i,j} s_is_j\min(|i-j|, len - |i-j|)\)ï¼Œå‰ç¼€å’Œä¼˜åŒ–å³å¯ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(1e5 + 5);
std::vector<int> g[N];
int n, in[N], low[N], cnt, fa[N], siz[N];
LL ans;
void dfs(int x) {
  in[x] = low[x] = ++cnt;
  siz[x] = 1;
  for (int y : g[x]) {
    if (y == fa[x]) continue;
    if (!in[y]) {
      fa[y] = x;
      dfs(y);
      siz[x] += siz[y];
      smin(low[x], low[y]);
    } else {
      smin(low[x], in[y]);
    }
    if (low[y] > in[x]) {
      ans += 1LL * (n - siz[y]) * siz[y];
    }
  }
  for (int y : g[x]) {
    if (fa[y] == x || in[y] < in[x]) continue;
    std::vector<LL> a, b;
    int p = 0;
    for (int i = y; i != x; i = fa[i]) {
      a.push_back(siz[i] - p);
      p = siz[i];
    }
    a.push_back(n - p);
    b.push_back(0);
    assert(*std::min_element(a.begin(), a.end()) > 0);
    assert(std::accumulate(a.begin(), a.end(), 0) == n);
    for (int i = 1, n = a.size(); i < n; i++) {
      LL a1 = a[i - 1], a2 = 0, b1 = b[i - 1], b2 = 0;
      if (i - n / 2 > 0) a1 -= a2 = a[i - n / 2 - 1], b1 -= b2 = b[i - n / 2 - 1];
      ans += (a1 * i - b1 + a2 * (n - i) + b2) * a[i];
      b.push_back(b[i - 1] + i * a[i]);
      a[i] += a[i - 1];
    }
  }
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int m;
  std::cin >> n >> m;
  while (m--) {
    int x, y;
    std::cin >> x >> y;
    g[x].push_back(y), g[y].push_back(x);
  }
  dfs(1);
  std::cout << ans << "\n";
  return 0;
}

H. Not A + B

ç­¾åˆ°é¢˜ã€‚

I. Cutting

ç»™ä¸€ä¸ªæ•´æ•°ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡æ“ä½œå°†è¿™ä¸ªæ•°ä»ä¸­é—´åˆ‡æˆä¸¤åŠï¼Œç„¶åæ›¿æ¢ä¸ºå·®çš„ç»å¯¹å€¼ï¼Œç›´åˆ°æœ€åï¼Œæ±‚æœ€ç»ˆçš„æœ€å°å€¼ä»¥åŠæ“ä½œè¿‡ç¨‹ã€‚

\(0 \leq x \leq 10^12\)ã€‚

æœç´¢ï¼Œå¯¹äº \(10^7\) å†…çš„çŠ¶æ€å¯ä»¥è®°å¿†åŒ–ï¼Œå¤§çš„çŠ¶æ€æ•°ä¸å¤šã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using LL = long long;
using PR = std::pair<int, LL>;
PR &get(LL i) {
    static PR f[10000000];
    static std::map<LL, PR> g;
    return i < 10000000 ? f[i] : g[i];
}
template <class T>
inline int smin(T &x, T y) {
    return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
PR dfs(LL i) {
    if (i < 10) return PR(i, 0);
    auto &v = get(i);
    if (v.first) return v;
    v = {10, 0};
    for (LL x = 10; i / x; x *= 10) {
        auto j = i / x - i % x;
        if (j < 0) j = -j;
        if (j && smin(v.first, dfs(j).first)) v.second = j;
    }
    return v;
}
int main() {
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--) {
        LL x;
        scanf("%lld", &x);
        std::vector<LL> v;
        for (LL o = x; o; o = dfs(o).second) v.push_back(o);
        printf("%d ", (int)v.size());
        for (LL x : v) printf("%lld ", x);
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}

J. Paternity Testing

\(n\) ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ‰æ ¹æ ‘ï¼Œ\(q\) æ¬¡è¯¢é—®åŒºé—´ \([l, r]\) ä¸­æ»¡è¶³ \(l \leq i, j \leq r, i \in subtree_j\) çš„æ•°å¯¹ \((i, j)\) çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚

\(n, q \leq 50000\)ï¼Œå¼ºåˆ¶åœ¨çº¿ã€‚

è€ƒè™‘æ±‚ä¸æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå®¹æ˜“å‘ç°æ¡ä»¶ä¸ºä¸¤ä¸ªå­æ ‘ä¸äº¤ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è·‘ä¸€ä¸‹dfsåºè½¬åŒ–ä¸º \(in[i] > out[j]\)ã€‚

å¦‚æœåªæœ‰ä¸€æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ï¼ŒæŠŠ \(l\dots r\) åˆ†åˆ«æŒ‰ \(in,out\) æ’åºååŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ‰«æå³å¯ã€‚

åˆ†å—ï¼Œè®¾å—é•¿ä¸º \(T\)ï¼Œå¯¹äºèŠ‚ç‚¹ \(i\) åˆ†åˆ«ç”¨åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ‰«æé¢„å¤„ç†å‡ºæ¯å—ä¸­ \(in[i] > out[j]\) å’Œ \(out[i] < in[j]\) çš„ \(j\) çš„ä¸ªæ•° \(g[i][b], h[i][b]\)ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n\log n + \frac{n^2}{T})\)ã€‚

ç„¶åé¢„å¤„ç†å—ä¸å—ä¹‹é—´çš„åŒºé—´ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œ\(ans[u][v] = \sum_{i = l}^{r} \sum_{j = u}^v g[i][j]\)ï¼Œç”¨å‰ç¼€å’Œå¯ä»¥åšåˆ° \(O(\frac{n^2}{T})\)ã€‚

å¯¹äºæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡è¯¢é—®ï¼ŒåŒºé—´åˆ†æˆä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šä¸­é—´è¿ç»­çš„å—å’Œä¸¤è¾¹çš„æ•£ç‚¹ã€‚

å—ä¹‹é—´çš„è´¡çŒ®å·²ç»é¢„å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ•£ç‚¹è‡ªå·±çš„è´¡çŒ®å¯ä»¥åŒæŒ‡é’ˆæ±‚å‡ºï¼Œæ•£ç‚¹å’Œå—çš„è´¡çŒ®å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ® \(g, h\) çš„å‰ç¼€å’Œè®¡ç®—ï¼Œå¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(T\log T)\)ã€‚

æ€»å¤æ‚åº¦ \(O(n \log n + \frac{n^2}{T} + qT\log T)\)ï¼Œå– \(T = \frac{n}{\sqrt{q}}\) å¯è¿‡ã€‚

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define perr(a...) fprintf(stderr, a)
#define dbg(a...) perr("\033[32;1m"), perr(a), perr("\033[0m")
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) {
  return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) {
  return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0;
}

using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(5e4 + 5);
std::vector<int> g[N], h[N];
int in[N], out[N];
void dfs(int x) {
  static int cnt;
  in[x] = ++cnt;
  for (int y : g[x]) dfs(y);
  out[x] = cnt;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  int n, q;
  std::cin >> n;
  for (int i = 2, x; i <= n; i++) {
    std::cin >> x;
    g[x].push_back(i);
  }
  std::cin >> q;
  dfs(1);
  int t = n / sqrt(q), m = (n - 1) / t + 1;
  std::vector<int> pin(n), pout;
  std::iota(pin.begin(), pin.end(), 1);
  pout = pin;
  auto cmp = [](int *p) {
    return [p](int i, int j) {
      return p[i] < p[j];
    };
  };
  std::sort(pin.begin(), pin.end(), cmp(in));
  std::sort(pout.begin(), pout.end(), cmp(out));
  auto block = [&](int i) { return (i - 1) / t; };
  std::vector<int> cnt(m);
  for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < n; i++) {
    int x = pin[i];
    for (; out[pout[j]] < in[x]; j++) cnt[block(pout[j])]++;
    g[x] = cnt;
  }
  for (auto &x : cnt) x = 0;
  for (int i = n - 1, j = i; i >= 0; i--) {
    int x = pout[i];
    for (; out[x] < in[pin[j]]; j--) cnt[block(pin[j])]++;
    h[x] = cnt;
  }
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    for (int j = 1; j < m; j++) g[i][j] += g[i][j - 1];
  }
  for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
    for (int j = 1; j < m; j++) h[i][j] += h[i][j - 1];
  }
  std::vector<std::vector<LL>> sum(m), iBlockAns(m);
  for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
    sum[i].resize(n + 1);
    for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) sum[i][j] = g[j][i] + sum[i][j - 1];
  }
  for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
    iBlockAns[i].resize(i + 1);
    int r = i == m - 1 ? n : i * t + t;
    LL now = 0;
    for (int j = i, l = i * t + 1; j >= 0; j--, l -= t) {
      for (int k = l; k < l + t && k <= r; k++) {
        now += g[k][i];
      }
      iBlockAns[i][j] = now;
      if (j) iBlockAns[i][j] -= sum[j - 1][r] - sum[j - 1][l - 1];
    }
  }
  LL ans = 0;
  while (q--) {
    int l, r;
    std::cin >> l >> r;
    l = (l ^ ans) % n + 1;
    r = (r ^ ans) % n + 1;
    if (l > r) std::swap(l, r);
    ans = 1LL * (r - l + 1) * (r - l) / 2 + r - l + 1;
    int bl = block(l), br = block(r);
    pin.clear();
    if (bl == br) {
      for (int i = l; i <= r; i++) pin.push_back(i);
    } else {
      for (int i = l, k = std::min(bl * t + t, n); i <= k; i++) pin.push_back(i);
      for (int i = br * t + 1; i <= r; i++) pin.push_back(i);
    }
    pout = pin;

    std::sort(pin.begin(), pin.end(), cmp(in));
    std::sort(pout.begin(), pout.end(), cmp(out));
    for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < pin.size(); i++) {
      while (out[pout[j]] < in[pin[i]]) j++;
      ans -= j;
    }
    if (bl + 1 <= br - 1) {
      bl++, br--;
      ans -= iBlockAns[br][bl];
      for (int i : pin) {
        ans -= g[i][br] - g[i][bl - 1];
        ans -= h[i][br] - h[i][bl - 1];
      }
    } 
    std::cout << ans << "\n";
  }
  return 0;
}

K. Chess Positions

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define dbg(...) std::cerr << "\033[32;1m", fprintf(stderr, __VA_ARGS__), std::cerr << "\033[0m"
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smin(T &x, const U &y) { return y < x ? x = y, 1 : 0; }
template <class T, class U>
inline bool smax(T &x, const U &y) { return x < y ? x = y, 1 : 0; }
using LL = long long;
using PII = std::pair<int, int>;

constexpr int N(1e6 + 5);

int n, m, k;
std::vector<int> g[N];
int in[N], out[N], cnt;
void dfs(int x) {
  in[x] = ++cnt;
  for (int y : g[x]) {
    dfs(y);
  }
  out[x] = cnt;
}
int c[N];
void add(int p, int x) {
  for (; p <= cnt; p += p & -p) {
    c[p] += x;
  }
}
int ask(int p) {
  int r = 0;
  for (; p; p -= p & -p) {
    r += c[p];
  }
  return r;
}
int main() {
  std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
  std::cin.tie(nullptr);
  std::string s, t;
  std::cin >> n >> m >> k >> s >> t;
  std::vector<int> p(m), q(m + n + 1); 
  p[0] = -1;
  for (int i = 1, j; i < m; i++) {
    for (j = p[i - 1]; j >= 0 && t[j + 1] != t[i]; j = p[j]) ;
    p[i] = j + (t[j + 1] == t[i]);
  }
  q[m - 1] = m;
  g[m].push_back(m - 1);
  for (int i = m - 2, j; i >= 0; i--) {
    for (j = q[i + 1]; j < m && t[j - 1] != t[i]; j = q[j]) ;
    q[i] = j - (t[j - 1] == t[i]);
    g[q[i]].push_back(i);
  }
  for (int i = n - 1, j = m; i >= 0; i--) {
    for (; j < m && t[j - 1] != s[i]; j = q[j]) ;
    j -= t[j - 1] == s[i];  
    if (j == 0) {
      if (i >= n - k && k - 1 < n - k) {
        std::cout << "Yes\n" << 1 << " " << n - k + 1 << "\n";
        return 0;
      }
      j = q[j];
    }
    g[j].push_back(i + m + 1);
    q[i + m + 1] = j;
  }
  dfs(m);
  std::vector<int> vis(m);
  for (int i = 0, j = -1; i < n - k; i++) {
    for (; j >= 0 && t[j + 1] != s[i]; j = p[j]) ;
    j += t[j + 1] == s[i];
    if (j == m - 1) {
      if (i < k && k - 1 < n - k) {
        std::cout << "Yes\n" << 1 << " " << n - k + 1 << "\n";
        return 0;
      }
      j = p[j];
    }
    if (i < k - 1) continue;
    for (int k = j; k >= m - ::k - 1 && vis[k] <= 0; k = p[k]) {
      vis[k] = i + 1;
      if (k < ::k) {
        add(in[k + 1], 1), add(out[k + 1] + 1, -1);
      } else {
        vis[k] = -vis[k];
      }
    }
    if (ask(in[i + m + 2])) {
      std::cout << "Yes\n";
      int x = q[i + m + 2];
      for (; x < m && vis[x - 1] <= 0; x = q[x]) ;
      std::cout << vis[x - 1] - k + 1 << " " << i + 2 << "\n";
      return 0;
    }
  }
  std::cout << "No\n";
  return 0;
}
